choices: Hear a noise in your closet
1.content:
BEEP...BEEP...BEEP
You awaken violently by a loud,repeating, high pitched sound. You roll your half awake body over to face your bedside table to see your alarm clock.

In red letters, the clock read 5:30 AM.

You strike out fast with your hand and slam down on the button, bringing an end to that horrible noise coming from that alarm clock. You groggily sit up in bed and step on to the floor.

Waking up early on a Monday... what could be better. You stand up straight, stretch,walk toward the light switch and flip it.

Well, you're awake. And that begged the question of what you should do now.
1.title: Start of it all

choices: bring it to school for the science fair
use it to test your shrinking sub
11.content:
You figured you might as well spend the extra time finishing your work. You change out of your sleep attire (a pair of boxers) into new boxers, socks, jeans, t shirt and your white lab coat. Sneaking from your room down to your lab in the basement proved simple enough since the floor was layered in carpet, making a squeak rare. The basement however, did not share this common attribute with most of the house, with its floor consisting of cold concrete. You approached an old wooden workman's table that was pushed up against the wall in the middle of the basement, (aka your "laboratory") and begun to get ready to resume your work.

You felt nervous and wiped your sweaty palms on the front of your jeans. All your hard work finally appeared to be paying off. You got a bottle of water from the mini fridge and chugged the refreshing beverage.

You hadn’t shared the nature of your research with anyone else. Choosing instead to tell curious family members that it was just the startup to building your own computer, which of course was a lie. In reality, you were constructing what would hopefully be the worlds first functioning shrink device

Teasing was something you suffered constantly, from bullies and friends alike. Poking at your strong interest in science, making fun of your ways and somewhat geeky behavior.

What kept you going was the strong confidence in that soon, it wouldn't matter. Your invention would win the science fair and make you millions of dollars. You sit on your chair, place your phone down out of the way and begin the finishing touches on the device. You noticed however, that your phones notification light was blinking. You turn it on and see that you had missed a text from your best friend Mitchell. He must have sent it right before you went to sleep.

"Whats up dude. You almost done that thing?"

The one exception to nobody knowing what you were truly working on what Mitch. You two had known each other since kindergarten and remained friends all the way to present day. While you had chosen to focus more on studies in your upbringing, Mitch had opted to be a more social creature. Attending parties on the regular, making friends wherever he goes and becoming quite popular at school and the ladies in particular. Sometimes you wondered why he would stay friends with you, but a quick thought about what kind of person Mitch was shut that thought down immediately. You had never known a more loyal person.

You shoot back a quick "almost" before shutting your phone off and continuing with the final touch on the device. The device resembled that of a tv remote with an antenna poking out from the top acting as the "barrel to the gun" so to speak.

It was finally complete! You opt to test it out on a rat you kept hidden under the desk for this very occasion. You reach under and grab the cage you kept it in and place it on your desk, keeping it in one place with a slice of roast beef before aiming, typing in the size setting to 7 mm, and pressing the red button marked "S".

A noticeable emission that resembled a heat wave focused onto the rat, enveloping it completely and blurring its image to your eye. You notice the rats size has begun to diminish down to about the size of a grain of rice. The waves cease and the rice grain sized rat is left happily chewing on a massive piece of roast beef.

You could barely contain yourself, just managing to stop yourself from yelling out in complete and utter joy to avoid waking your sleeping family. The next step was to test the growth setting, so you press blue button marked "G" and revert the rat to its original size.

Everything seemed to be working swimmingly.
11.title: Finish your project (genius)

111.content:
The device worked perfectly and your confidence had just sky rocketed to astronomical proportions. You literally could not wait to get this to school and show it off.

You grab the device, run upstairs, take a shower, brush your teeth, pack your bag along with the shrink ray and run back downstairs to gorge down a bowl of rice krispies before booking it outside and speed walking down to school.

You wanted to get their early to start setting up your booth in one of the gymnasiums. You arrived at the school and head to the gym. The tables were already set up in rows spanning the length of the gym. You pick a spot near the door. A table sat there all alone, seperate from the others, which suited you well. You wanted to have lots of room for the crowds when they got a whiff of your invention.

You place your backpack ontop of it to claim it, then you decide to walk the halls to kill time. After all, the science fair was going to take place after school. You keep the remote in your pocket and exit the gym. You walk past the cafeteria and see some of your friends sitting at one of the tables. They were the ones who get dropped off early because theyre parents had to go to work early in the morning.

You sit with them until the first bell rings, then you head to your first class.
111.title: Me, an intellectual

choices: You shrink down a desk to prove it
You activate the remote but it malfunctions
1111.content:
"So, what are you gonna do tonight?" You asked your friend Nick as the two of you walked into the class room. You both had Math as your first subject and decided to walk in before the second bell rang. At that point you were the only ones in the room.

"Oh, nothing much," he replied. "Just sitting around my house, probably get the crew to play some Halo. What about you? You down?"

"Course Im down."

As you both were standing there talking, the teacher, Mrs. Gray, walked by and said,
"Good morning guys. I have to run down to the library quickly to make some copies. I'll be back in a moment." The two of you watched her leave out the door.

You turned back around to continue your conversation with Nick, and you noticed how giddy you were becoming at the thought of the science fair once you revealed your invention.

"Hm? Whats with the look?", Nick asked.

"Look? What look?"

"Your sweating and your giving off some wild vibes. Whats up with you?"

Apparently you werent very good at hiding excitement. You supposed it was just getting to hard to contain it this long. You had to tell someone before your head blew up!

"Alright listen I'll tell you. But you cant tell anyone until the science fair after school. I mean it man, this is big!"

"How big can it be? Its just a stupid science fair."

"Thats just the beginning. Im going to use it to get the word out about my invention! All the people and their phones, it will be all over the world by tomorrow!"

"Well shit! If its that awesome let me take a look."

Nick was going to be the first person to lay eyes on the invention of the century! This was the precursor to everything! This was going to be not only Nicks reaction, but everyones! You hoped it would be good.

With great patience you slowly reached into your pocket, hoping to add a layer of suspense, which Nick clearly wasnt going for. So with a quickened pace you pulled the device out and showed it to him.

He of course didnt realize whay it was he was looking at, so you informed him with a brief explanation.

"Wait. You're telling me you made a shrink ray?"

You nodded slowly with anticipation for the moment Nick would freak out.

"Come on, thats just a weird remote. You're fucking with me."
1111.title: Math and the Matics

choices: The teacher arrives and picks up the remote!
Nick spots you and starts charging at you!
11113.content:
"Just a weird remote huh? How wrong you are buddy.", you raise the remote up to your head and wag it to truly grab Nicks full attention. "Take a look at this."

After correctly calibrating the device, you aim it at the desk in front of you and fire. The remote sparks in your hand and emits a bright blinding light that engulfs you and Nick in its rays! You both let out surprised shrieks as your sizes dwindle down to that of ants on the vinyl tile floor with no one around but the two of you as witnesses!

When your vision cleared, you knew right away what had happened. Though the reason why escaped your knowledge. Somehow, your genius invention had backfired and put you and Nick in place of the desk you had intended to target. Speaking of Nick, you looked over where you last saw him and spotted him in the distance underneath his own skyscraper sized desk. From the looks of his movements, he was currently in the middle of a mental breakdown.
11113.title: Shrunken Students

choices: Leave to go to her desk
111131.content:
“Shoot.. shootshootshoot” you mutter to yourself.. “where’s the remote..? How.. This shouldn’t have..” in the midst of your stuttering and slight panic, you look back over in Nick’s direction to not only see him, but hear his faint, tiny, screaming squeaks about 3 football fields away.

“He’s going to have an anxiety attack if I don’t go over and calm him down” you think to yourself. With that, you begin your run to the location of Nick. The area surrounding you was almost overwhelming as desk legs rose thousands of feet into the air holding their landscape of a desk top above it. There were also pebbles and pieces of dirt detached from shoes of students over the past couple days laying in your path.

It took a few minutes but you were finally within a comfortable earshot of Nick, who was now backed up against a metal desk leg.

As soon as you gathered up the air in your lungs to call out, large ground shaking thumps began to appear, each one louder than the first.. you slowly turned your head to see two large black tennis shoes crash down near you. You looked up to see the figure of your giant math teacher, Mrs. Gray, back from the library and now looking at the desk you almost shrunk.. but it wasn’t the desk she was looking at, it was the device on top.. the remote!

“Oh no” you said out loud while also looking back at Nick who was frantically waving his arms now trying to get the teachers attention. Without any luck, Nick have you and took a dead sprint towards the giant black tennis shoes and jumped onto a shoe lace.. and you knew you had to as well.

You run to the opposite shoe, the one closest to you, and jump on the other shoelace just as Mrs. Gray was about to...
111131.title: Incoming Threat: Teacher

choices: Mrs Gray tells Kenzie to bring it to the lost and found
Kenzie drops it into her gym bag
Someone takes it out of Kenzies hand
111133.content:
The guilt you felt was weighing heavy on you while you watched the distant form of Nick jogging in a extatic pace back and forth like he was lost with no clue where to go. From here, you could even hear the slightest peep from his screams, filled with vulgar words from what you could tell.

But atleast you knew where Nick was,... what was really worrying you was the fact you couldnt see jack shit of the shrink remote! There was no sign of it down here on the floor anywhere! Which could only mean it had landed on the chair or table of your desk, miles above your head, with no way up there but glass smooth steel legs! This whole situation was fucked and should simply not be happening. You tested the thing this morning and it was flawless, so what the hell made it shit the bed like that? It was so ridiculous, you bowed your head in shame, when suddenly you heard the sound of fast approaching footsteps behind.

It surprised you to see Nick sprinting full force in your direction a few feet away at that point, what didnt surprise you was that you didnt even have time to dodge as the star of the track team blitzed himself straight into your gut, knocking the wind out of you and sending you down on your back with him on top of you. You gasp and choke for air and Nick cuffs his fists around the collar of your shirt, lifting your head closer to his.

"What did you do!?", he squeeked in pitchy voice. "The desk you idiot! I thought you were shrinking the desk! Not us!"

You try to signal Nick to show you mercy as you tap his shoulder as if this was MMA. Your lungs were still devoid of air as you coughed and wheezed. This seemed to do the trick, as Nick released his grip and stood over you, watching you roll around on the floor. Your suffering must have imbued pity into Nick, because you soon found him helping you to your feet, though not as gently as what would have been appreciated. Once steady on your feet, you take a few moments to catch your breath, and soon you recover, straightnening yourself to meet Nicks eyes with your own, seeing him giving you the evilest look youve even seen on a mug in your life. You raise a defensive hand, signaling him to chill out.

"Okay... Nick *cough cough*, just relax. This was not supposed to happen alright. It malfunctioned. But we'll fix this okay?"

"Fix it!? You fucking better man! This is bullshit!"

"Nick! We need to get back to the remote. Its gotta be somewhere up there.", you say, pointing to the sky at your desk.

"How are we supposed to get it if its way up there?"

"Honestly man... beats me."

"No, I will beat you. Figure it out already!"

Suddenly, at the end of Nicks outburst, you hear the ear screaching creak of the classroom door as it opens to allow a horde of ginormous students to enter, each taking booming footsteps on their way to their desks.

"Ohhhh no. This isnt good.", you say in a mousy tone.

"Why?", Nick asks with veins in his forehead. "They wont see us to make fun of us!"

"But they could step on us!"

Both of your eyes grow wide as you both turn your heads to the first of the approaching students in this row, your friend McKenzie, with her crushing sandal clad feet! You and Nick both scream in terror as you turn to run in the opposite direction, and you look behind your back to see the bottom of the sandal moving fast towards you!

Thoughts of death flood your mind, for you thought you would be flattened beneath the black EVA sole into paste without anybody noticing. But by a miracle, Kenzies foot slams down just a hair behind your ass, sending a shockwave of force out that blasts you and Nick forward onto your bellies! You slide across the floor before coming to a halt just infront of the classrooms back wall.

It was lucky you and Nick always sat at the back of the class, or else there would be no way you would be safe right now. Nick was the first one to stand up and he rushes over to help you stand up aswell.

"You good?", Nick asked.

"Good. Because I dont want to alarm you, but Kenzie has your damn shrink ray!", he says, while pointing a shaky finger up at your towering friends hand, which was currently clutching yours and Nicks only chance at salvation!
111133.title: Big Fury in a Tiny Package

choices: You Fall Asleep During the Movie
1112.content:
P.E your least favorite subject for obvious reasons, you were a scientist! You had no time for exercise!

You went back to the gym and saw a small sign

"Due to the science fair P.E will be in room 782"

You smiled, no working out today.

You went to the room and your P.E teacher explained that today the class will be watching a movie. The class cheered while the teacher rolled her eyes before booting up the movie.

What now?
1112.title: Phys ed

choices: You try to make adjustments on the shrink ray
You realize you left it at the school
You get a phone call from one of the judges
11121.content:
It was time for the science fair. You were both excited and nervous. Your table was set up with a small poster board explaining the science of the shrink ray, although honestly you doubted many people cared about the science of it. For the demonstration you and a candle and a frog you grabbed from the science lab.

You waited nervously till the judges came to your table.

“Ladies and gentleman, I would like to demonstrate my shrink ray!” You announced, everyone turned to look at you. Now you had everyone’s attention, great. You took a deep breath and picked up the shrink ray and pointed it at the candle. You pulled the trigger and a beam shot out of it shrinking it. People gasped in surprise,

“It also works on living things.” You grinned and shrunk the frog.

Now people, were really excited. “Black magic!” A sophomore named Pyro exclaimed. His real name was Aaron but after incident where he lit a bunch of fireworks on the roof of the school the nickname stuck.

“It’s not magic, moron.” His freshman brother Ren retorted. “I know that, I was trying to be funny.” Pyro said “you did a crappy job then.”

The judges looked to each other and smiled.

At the end when they were stating the results of the science fair you ended up winning.

You went back home with a grin, carrying a large golden trophy.

What happens when you get home?
11121.title: Skip to Science Fair

choices: Do some test runs to prepare for the demonstration
Ignore the shrink ray and do something else
111214.content:
You set the trophy on your book shelf for now. It's so big that you'll need to think about where it would fit best but your thoughts are interrupted by a phone call.

"Hello, I am John Simmons, one of the judges at the science fair. You mentioned that it also works on living things. We would like a demonstration. We'll even pay you ten thousand dollars to demonstrate it for us."

You ask, "Should I bring an animal to shrink?"

"No, for the sake of science, we want to select the test subject. We want to know that the test subject wasn't prepared ahead of time."

You and John Simmons arrange a time and place for the demonstration.
111214.title: You get a phone call from one of the judges

choices: one of the older members of the audience
one of the younger members of the audience
1112141.content:
You walk into the place and see your audience. It is a small crowd but there are a variety of people in the crowd. You do recognize all the judges from the science fair and you can easily figure out their colleagues are that Mr. Simmons had mentioned on the phone but there are also some other people that you weren't expecting including some younger people.

You set up the shrink ray and are ready for the demonstration. You ask, "Where is the animal you want me to shrink?"

Mr. Simmons says, "We want you to shrink _____."
1112141.title: Skip to the demonstration

choices: They take the shrink ray leaving you tiny
They want to examine you to make sure you're okay
They want you to perform some tricks for them to prove that you are okay
One of them takes a little more personal interest in you
11121411.content:
You say, "Wait, I thought you wanted an animal that you knew wasn't prepared."

Mr. Simmons asks, "Well are you prepared?"

You say, "No."

Mr. Simmons says, "Then you are perfect."

So you slowly step into place to be shrunk. Mr. Simmons asks for instructions on how to use the shrink ray and you tell him how to shrink you. You feel the beam hit and for the first time realize what that rat and frog experienced. It's not an unpleasant experience. You feel tingly and you see crackling lights in front of your eyes and then suddenly, everything around you grows larger.

Soon you find yourself at a height of a few inches looking up at a whole crowd of people looking down at you.
11121411.title: yourself

choices: Mr. Simmons says, "Shall we try for smaller?"
The doctor cleans the petri dish for a better view. He sweeps your clothes away.
Mr. Simmons comes up with another test
The pretty young girl asks to look in the microscope
111214112.content:
Mr. Simmons says, "This is so cool and has so many practical applications. Imagine being able to shrink down to perform microscopic repairs. Have you tried microscopic shrinking yet?"

You say, "Smallest I've done so far was 7 mm."

Mr. Simmons says, "That reminds me. You're sure the rat was healthy after the experiments. How thoroughly did you examine it."

You describe how the rat seemed fine and Mr. Simmons expresses disappointment. He says, "For someone brilliant enough to invent something so revolutionary, you couldn't even think to examine the rat and make sure there weren't side effects? We better examine you now to make sure you are okay."

The examination is as ordinary as can be except for the fact that you are only a few inches tall and you have an audience. But there is at least one pretty girl in the audience that smiles at you, encouraging you. So you take your shirt off. The doctor's stethoscope is as big as you so they are limited in what they can examine. The doctor instructs you to stand in a petri dish under a microscope while he examines you. He very carefully shines a light in your ear and then later looks down your throat.

Now comes the more difficult part. He asks you to lower your underwear for a pelvic exam. He tries to feel your balls but his finger is as big as you so the underwear gets in the way. So you finally just ditch them and after he's done, you stand there with your hands on your hips looking at the smiling young girl. You know she's flirting with you.

Mr. Simmons says, "Okay we can proceed to see just how small this device goes to."

Because of your small size, it is more difficult for Mr. Simmons to target you but before you manage to grab any clothes, you feel the beam and know you're shrinking.

Mr. Simmons says, "If I'm reading this right, you are now one tenth of a meter tall."

You look up and everything is so huge now that you can barely tell what anything is anymore. Even your clothes that are sized for a few inch tall person now look they could cover a football field. You look up at the microscope lens towering above you and notice the doctor is looking down the lens at you. Even magnified under the microscope you only look like you are four millimeters tall. You're a third the size of a pixel. Some rice fell out of your pocket into the petri dish and even though the rice was one twenty fourth it's normal size, each grain was twice as big as you.

You can barely see the pretty girl anymore.
111214112.title: They want to examine you to make sure you'r...

choices: Brittany, the daughter of one of the scientists
11121414.content:
Mr. Simmons looked at you and smiled. "We want you to shrink one of us here. Preferably a younger member of the audience."

You cannot believe the words that just came out of Mr. Simmons mouth. Was he really giving you permission to fire the shrink ray at any member of the audience?

"So wait, I can just shrink anyone here?" you ask.

Mr. Simmons smiled and nodded. "Yep, all yours."

You smile and make a quick adjustment to the shrink ray, changing the setting to reduce your target to one quarter of an inch tall, the size of a small ant.

"Alright, now who to choose," you say to yourself. You see several nervous faces in the crowd in front of you, belonging to people who clearly did not want to be picked.

You identified several options in the crowd. One was a 25 year old grad student named Brad, who was accompanied by his boss, a 45 year old woman named Helen. It may be fun to shrink him, after all, he was only a grad student.

Then there was a 30 year old scientist named Maria, who you found extremely attractive, perhaps you could shrink her.

Then there was an 8 year old girl named Brittany in the back of the room. Clearly she was the daughter of someone in the audience, but hey, Mr. Simmons said anyone in the room. You give mischievous smile. You aim the shrink ray at....
11121414.title: one of the younger members of the audience

choices: Amy triggers it with the flash
You stop her but it still goes off shrinking both of you
1113.content:
As you head down the halls toward homeroom, you get a text from your friend Mitch. You walk and watch your phone and end up accidentally bumping straight into your friend Amy!

"Sorry! Excuse me - Oh hey Josh!"

"Hey. Sorry about that I was just talking to Mitch."

"Thats okay. You in a rush to homeroom?"

"Little bit. I guess you are too.", you joke.

"Heh, oh yeah! I better get going but lets meet up at lunch. A bunch of us are going to McDs to eat."

"Sure. Sounds great. See ya later!"

You both turn to go your seperate ways and once you had taken a few steps down the hallway you heard Amy calling after you.

"Hey Josh wait a sec!"

"Whats up?", you asked.

"I forgot to tell you i got a new phone recently so i lost your number. You mind if i get it again?"

"Now? Uh... sure. Okay its ###-###-####."

"Okay got it." Amy holds her screen up to your face showing you she has the camera on. "Contact photo?"

"Right. Lets do it."

Amy smiles and aims the camera at you. But as she does this, you start to feel a weird vibration in your pocket, it wasnt your phone, that was in your other pocket, this pocket had your shrink ray in it. A look of concern flashes across your face as Amys finger hovers above the button.
1113.title: Bump into Amy

11132.content:
In a matter of miliseconds, the shrink ray activated, emitting a loud POP due to its obvious malfunction, spooking Amy into letting go of her books and shrinking both yourself and her down to the size of bugs!

The books slam down next to your tiny forms and shakes the ground, narrowly missing you both. You glance over at Amy and see she is frantically looking around at the gigantic place, trying to piece everything together in her mind.

You walked up to the side of Amy and said, "Amy, are you okay?"



"Yeah, I'm fine.", she says with a shaky voice. "What uh... what happened?"

You awkwardly start rubbing the back of your head.
"Well... see I uh... I made a shrink ray. It was in my pocket and it went off for some reason."

From the look on Amys face, it was obvious she wasnt ready to believe that explanation, despite the circumstances. So you reach for your pocket to show her the remote but its not there! It must have fallen out as you shrunk!

Suddenly we felt the ground shake.
"Um, what was that?"
Another shake happened, this time a little more harsh. A pattern of BOOMS one after another continued like this, getting louder and heavier after each one. As if the source was getting closer.

"That would probably be the footsteps of somebody walking toward us," I said nervously.

"Uh, oh." We both turned to look down the hallway and found the source of the tremors, as someone turned the corner and entered our point of view!
11132.title: Tiny Malfunction

112.content:
You could hardly wait to try this out for yourself. At that moment, nobody could have made you go back to bed or simply wait until school to use it again. You place the rat back in its cage and position yourself in the middle of the floor, preparing to use the device on yourself.

What size do you set it to?
112.title: Field testing

1121.content:
Seemed to you that seven inches seemed like a good starting off point. After setting the size in the devices computer, you aim it at yourself and prepare for the greatest experience of your life. You had installed a safety measure that you felt was definitely important ,it would ensure the device would shrink along with the user, as long as it remained in their hand.

"Alright,here we go."

You set the size into the remotes computer and fire it off on yourself, transforming your view of the room around you and shrinking you down to the size of an action figure. You were astonished, but needed to take a second to adjust to the sudden arrival of vertigo that knocked you off balance for a second. This was absolutely breathtaking! Your basement had gone from being a drab, and rather depressing, cold room, to a sight more impressive than any of the wonders of the world!

So many thoughts rushed into your head on what to do next...
1121.title: G.I. Josh

11211.content:
Taking in the sights of your house sounded like fun. The basement was breath taking enough and it was the most dreary room in the house! You jog over to the wooden staircase and hoist yourself up one step at a time until you reached the very top. Your arms ached a bit now, but you werent gonna let that stop you from exploring.

You turn the corner and scout the area, seeing your mother talking to your step sister, Jessica, in the kitchen. When did she get here? Your mother must have invited her over to drive you to school. Despite being the daughter of her ex husbands new wife, your mom got along quite well with her.

In the living room, you saw Chris watching "Ice Road Truckers" on the t.v. The question now was, do you approach your family, or go on exploring?
11211.title: explore the house

choices: Attempt to get out of the basement
1122.content:
Your excitement didn't prepare you for the overwhelming vertigo that took over your senses as your body dwindled down in size to the proportions similar to that of a Lego mini figure. You couldn't even keep yourself awake. The vertigo soon became pure nauseousness and you found yourself slowly tipping over as you drifted into sleep. Your gradual return to full consciousness extended over a period of about fifteen minutes. You were staring up at a ceiling that now seemed like it was miles and miles above you. Not that you could even really realize that, because your body and senses felt so exhausted that you could barely stand up straight, let alone move.

"Ugh... my head.", you grumbled.

Slowly, weakness was overtaken by returning energy in your body and your senses cleared. Allowing you to finally take in the sights of your gargantuan basement.

"Oh my god. It worked! It really did! This is amazing!"

You turn your focus on something. It looked the size of a 4 story building. Upon further inspection you realized this was the shrinking device! It must have fallen on the floor when you used it on yourself.

"What? No! It was supposed to shrink with me!"

You ran over to the device and attempted to scale it in order to reach the buttons, but the sides were all to smooth to climb. If you wanted to return to normal size you would need someone to help you. Your only solace was the side effect you had engineered into the device that caused the targets molecules to become more dense, allowing the subject to take much more damage than a regular person and still be able to push on, but they were by no means invincible. This also made the subject considerably stronger, but no where near extreme levels. You figured that at the very least this would make your situation easier than had you shrunk and remained a weakling.

Just to make sure it actually worked... you figured you had to test it. So very hesitantly, you went down on all fours, and prepared to smack your head against the concrete floor.

*THUD*

"...Well that didn't hurt much at all."

You felt the impact but no lingering feeling of dizziness or pain remained. Now that that question was more or less checked off, you now had to test out your strength.

"Hmmm? Well... I've always wanted to do this."

You flip over onto a handstand and proceed to do one handed push ups with ease. Maxing out at 50 before the blood rushing into your head forced you back upright.

"Awesome."

There wasn't much you could do now except sit around and wait for something to happen. Whether that something was an idea or an event. You sit down and lean up against the white walls of the device and calm yourself down. It wasn't all that bad. Your new found strength and durability could make this whole thing into a fun adventure. There was no rush to even return to normal size.

More time passed. You felt a chill. Your eyes snapped open. A way upstairs couldn't come soon enough. It was freezing in this damn basement.You grunted and lifted yourself onto unsteady feet. A large wall of white was behind you. You walked closer to the expanse and touched the wall. It felt like smooth glass. Doesn't matter how strong you were, only Spider Man could climb up this wall.

“Everything looks so big!” This was still so astounding to you.

You compared yourself to the device to give yourself a rough guesstimate on your height.

“I must be around an inch tall!" You exclaimed. "Good. At least I know the on board computer is working properly."
1122.title: Lego size

11221.content:
You hear the door open upstairs and a voice calling down to you.

"Josh? You still down there?"

It was Jess! But why was she still here? You thought she had left to go to that country music festival.

Upon hearing no response from you, Jessica begins walking down the stairs coming into full view when she reaches the bottom of the stairs.

She was certainly dressed for an outdoor festival. Short jean shorts and a loose fitting tank top seemed to be uniform for beautiful women at parties. She was truly a sight to behold. Your first encounter with a giant. This was exciting and terrifying to maximum levels. By the way she was surveying the room, you figured she must have forgotten something. Her attention then seemed to have locked onto something far behind you. You couldn't see past the device, but you remembered that there were a few boxes back there.

She had tears streaming down her face. You knew you had to do something. Clearly, there were too many of these humites to fight your way out of here, but maybe you could talk your way out.

"Excuse me, general," you say, stepping forward. You are instantly grabbed by two of the soldiers. One again strikes you with a metal pole in your abdomen, and you drop down to a knee.

"The mutant dares to address you, general," one of the soldiers says, drawing laughs from his companions.

The general raises one hand again and there was silence. One thing was for sure, this guy had authority. He finally turned to face you. "Speak, mutant!" he commanded.

You take a deep breath, not exactly sure where to begin. You decide to just spill your guts. "Please sir, you need to believe me," you begin. "I know it sounds crazy, but I actually am Josh, the one you refer to as a God. I just ended up shrinking down to your size. And your Goddess is in fact my mother, Jennifer."

You thought for a second you could see a conflicted look in the general's eyes. Had he actually believed you. "I do not know or care what you are," he said. "But you falsely claim to be a God, then commit the unforgivable act of rescuing a sacrifice. The only way to resolve this is to sacrifice both of you."

Two soldiers grab you and lift you up. You stay quiet as you don't want that nasty, painful looking device Laylette is wearing on your face. Tears are streaming down your face now as well. "Where...where are you gonna take us?" you ask.

The general smiles slightly, as if he's getting enjoyment out of this. The hovercraft begins to lower over part of your mother's body. "You shall be sacrificed into the depths of our great Goddess Jennifer's....
113131233222.title: Sacrifice you and Laylette to Goddess Jennifer

1131312332221.content:
All you can do is stare blankly at the hostile general, a panic was now brewing inside you, did he really just casually say he’s going to literally feed your miniature self to your own mother? Eventually you speak out “please, you don’t have to do this to your people” he completely ignores you and turns to look out the window, of which your mothers giant face now fills. His smile deepens before saying “You two will serve the goddesses hunger, as many have before you, and many will after, you will have the great honour of being absorbed into and becoming part of her body.” Every word of this sounded horrifying to you.

Jennifer having now cooked the family breakfast, was sat in front of a plate full of eggs bacon and sausages with a large mug of coffee to the side. This was the normal weekend routine for her. It allowed her a break from her normally strict diet and got everyone together for breakfast.

You try one last bargain “please just let me go and I will prove to you, I have this ship and b...” but before you can finish the general cuts you off, “enough!!! Take them to the drop room!!”

You and Laylette are promptly taken to a small room at back of the ship with a solid metal floor, you can guess what’s going to happen here. Before even being given the choice to enter willingly, a soldier aggressively throws you across the floor, Laylette gasps in pain as her face mask is forcefully removed, only then to be given the same forceful treatment you were, leaving you both in a huddle in the centre of the room. Both soldiers then turn to go, firmly shutting the door behind them leaving you and Laylette with only darkness and silance.

Laylette sobbed quietly to herself, the speed in which she abandoned hope slightly frustrated you, especially as she had already somehow survived this process once just hours ago. You try to scan around the darkness for a way out, but the rooms sealed tight, you then can’t help but ask, “so how did you end up in my moms ear?” It takes her a few minutes to gather herself before saying “sniff... you know you all had tacos the other night right?” You didn’t really want to respond here, it highlighted the fact you were in a way part of this god scene, “I was in the goddesses taco, but got.. well spilt.. and well basically I ended up on her jeans , then her finger and then her um.. ear, sniff....”she sighed at the idea of it. “The chance of that happening again though is impossible. literally everyone ends up eaten, or worse” and with that she broke down in full tears again, this time you can’t help but put your arm around her shoulders, in a last gasp attempt of comfort.

You certainly didn’t want to ask her what “worse” involves now, you still can’t comprehend the situation yourself, your sweet loving mother, who wouldn’t hurt a fly has apparently consumed hundreds if not thousands of “sacrifices” over the years, and you’re just another number to that list about to meet their fate on the inside of her slender belly.

After a few more minutes of waiting a siren sounded and you both knew exactly what was coming, Laylette just closed her eyes. You take a deep breathe..

With a loud clank the metal floor beneath you dropped open sending you both falling towards ...
1131312332221.title: Sacrifice to the goddesses hunger

11313123322211.content:
You and Laylette stand there in silence, waiting for the worst to happen. The silence is occasionally broken by a terrified whimper from Laylette. Then, the siren's stop ringing. The metallic floor beneath you suddenly gave way, sending both you and Laylette plummeting downwards to your certain demise.

With your entire life flashing before your eyes, your stomach leaps up to your throat as you continue to to free fall. You are brought back to reality from Laylette's terrified screams. Part of this all seems odd to you. Why would these humites drop you out of a hovercraft? Wouldn't that mean you would fall to your death and would not be a sacrifice?

As you looked down, it soon dawned on you exactly what these humites had in mind. Below you was a warm, but not hot, mug of coffee. Bracing for impact, you hold your nose and assume a cannonball position. Warm liquid envelops your body as you and Laylette enter the mug.

Surfacing in the warm brown liquid, you are gasping for breath. "Laylette? Laylette where are you?" you call out in a panic.

"Help me!" you hear coming from behind you. Turning, while treading coffee, you see Laylette who is desperately flailing her arms, trying to stay above water.

"Hang on," you call out, trying to swim towards her.

"I can't swim!" she screams, as you see her head descend beneath the surface. Knowing you had to act fast, you take a deep breath of air and dive below the surface of the coffee. Through the brown filter around you, you can barely make out the form of a struggling being. You breast stroke towards her and grab her, pulling her up.

Laylette is crying again while gasping for air. "Thank you," she says, spitting out coffee.

You are about to tell her not to worry about it, when the current starts to change. You feel yourself and Laylette being pulled in a new directoin. Then you see your mother's gigantic face, with her lips approaching the side of the cup.

"Mom!" you yell.

Laylette is much quieter and only manages to stutter out, "The...the goddess."

Your mom, Jennifer, lifts the mug up to her face, and begins to sip her warm beverage, completely unaware of the chaos she is causing.

Inside the cup, you and Laylette have been separated again, both drifting towards your mother's cavernous mouth. You hear a scream as what happens...
11313123322211.title: Your mothers coffee mug

choices: Trust Laylette and submit to be swallowed
113131233222113.content:
The blood curdling scream echoes round your head, a firm reminder of how horrifying situation was, you are literally on the verge of being ingested by your sweet gentle mother, and she has no idea she causing so much terror.

You have instinctively started swimming against the increasing flow of brown liquid, simultaneously you scan around trying to locate Laylette but since her cry’s for help have gone quiet you can only guess she’s already been swept into the darkness beyond the enormous pursed lips.

You put all your full strength into every stroke but it quickly becomes apparent that your actions are doing little to change your momentum, your tiny millimetre body’s actions offering little resistance to the raging current flowing towards your mothers thirsty mouth. You abandon swimming and turn to try one last desperate attempt at getting her attention, but by the time you turn her eyes aren’t even in view anymore, all you can see now is large overhanging nose and a wall of glossy pink flesh, with a opening drawing everything around you into it. The sound of gushing liquid fills your ear and a dark shadow looms. “Mum please...” you muster as one last plea to the gigantic woman but to no avail and you are effortlessly sucked into her awaiting mouth.

The second you pass the lips you are instantly pulled into a swirling vortex of coffee and saliva sloshing around the dark confines of your mothers mouth and forming a deep lake within it. It was as if she knew you were now inside because her lips firmly close behind you leaving you in a deeper darkness. luckily for you, Jennifer seems intent on enjoying her mouthful of coffee rather than gulping it straight down. The smell of coffee, morning breathe and already consumed breakfast assaults your nostrils making you gag profusely , the air was humid, really humid. You call out to Laylette not really expecting an answer for all the surrounding chaos. You try desperately to adjust your eyes to the new darkness, you need to find something in her mouth to hold on to before she sends you to join her breakfast. You can just about make out something pink hanging above in the distance which you can only assume is her uvula so you turn and put all your effort back into swimming away from it. In front of you a row of teeth come into focus, but they seem so far away and you are already exhausted.

Then just when you feel all hope is lost, to your surprise you hear a voice that you can only assume is from some dark corner of this disgusting place, “ just relax Danielle, it will all be ok” it was Laylette, you are both relieved and amazed she hadn’t drowned, you quickly call back “Laylette just hold on to something before she..,” you suddenly stop, the current is picking up again, from somewhere beneath the coffee lake an enormous whale-like tongue has started rising. You panic and automatically jump back into a furious swim against the increasing flow again. “Don’t fight it Danielle, it will be ok just let the goddess take you, save your strength” you try to ignore this, you don’t want to even imagine what the inside of a stomach would be like let alone enter one willingly.

The sound of your mother’s teeth throat contracting is deafening, her muscular tongue now rising high above pushing everything into her esophagus, With your last gasp of energy you..
113131233222113.title: You both get sucked in

choices: You jump off the tongue and join Laylette by the teeth
Laylette tries to grab you but is forced along with you
1131312332221132.content:
Even though your muscles hurt like hell, you had no desire to be burned alive in stomach acids. Needless to say, that would be so much worse than sore limbs and it was no choice at all. You summon every ounce of stength you didnt even know you had left and fight against the current of coffee.

"La..."

Your coughing and gasping for air interupted you as you attempted to call out for Laylette.

"Laylette! Where are you!"

Your voice quietly echoed around the mouth, being mostly silenced by the sound of rapid moving coffee. It was similar to the sound of heavy water crashing against rocks.

Amidst the noise, you could faintly hear Laylette speaking.

"It cant be avoided. Its going to happen. Our goddess has willed it."

"Laylette! Do you hear me! Dont give up!"

You swim towards the voice. It was hard to make out in the darkness but it seemed to be coming from closer to the front of the mouth by the teeth. As you swam closer, you felt something rising beneath, making contact with your feet. You knew this was your mothers tongue forcing the coffee down her throat and if you didnt find sonething to grab onto quick, you would join it.

You half swim and half scramble across the rest of the way to the source of the voice and find Laylette had wedged her arm between two of your mothers molars. The tongue had rised so that now you were now on a slant and finding it hard to keep your footing and had begun sliding along the tongue towards the abyss of your mothers esophagus.
1131312332221132.title: Momma didnt raise a quitter

11313123322211322.content:
Sliding down your mothers tongue towards her throat, you tried your best to dig your hands into her taste buds, hoping to stop yourself or even have her spit your foul tasting self out. But not only could you keep your grip on the soft fleshy tongue, but apparently you didn't taste half bad or you were simply too small to taste because before you knew it you had slid of the edge of the tongue and found yourself staring down the deep black hole into your mothers gullet.

Time seemed to slow down as you contemplated your death. Was this really how you were going to die? Dissolved and materialized into your mothers shit? As you began to accept that this was the way it was, you feel a hand grip onto the collar of your shirt. You slammed against the wall of the throat as you dangled above it.

"Laylette?!"

She somehow managed to grab onto you while dangling from your mothers uvula, which you could tell was taking up most of her strength. It didnt take long for her hand to slip off and the two of you began falling down the esophagus.

113131233223.content:
“Our plan is to interrogate you, with force if necessary,” the general says coldly. “Take him away.”

“Wait stop,” you plead, as two of the guards grab you, and pull you towards a separate room on the ship. You look back and see a terrified look in Laylette’s eyes, with that metal muzzle still over her face. The image was haunting to you.

The guards force you down onto a chair and cuff yours hands. The room it well lit. You gulp as the guards exit and the general enters the room, locking the door and smiling in a uncomfortable manor.

“Please, you gotta let me out of here,” you beg, as the general does not say anything. “You have to believe me! I’m not a mutant! I’m a human being!” There is desperation in your voice, you are coming close to tears.

The general walks to the door and places his ear against it. He then turns back to you. “Relax Josh, I know,” the general said, much tonuour surprise.

Your eyes widen. “Wait what?” you ask.

The general exhales. “Yes, the high authorities such as myself have been monitoring your progress on the device for some time now. I just couldn’t let the unintelligible fools out there know.”

You cannot believe what you are hearing. “So....will you help me return to normal?”

The general smiles. “Not exactly,” he says, as your heart drops. “We want to utilize your technology and you’re going to help us do it.”

You cannot believe the audacity of this....guy. How could he expect you to help him operate the shrink ray while not offering to return you to normal size. “You’ve gotta be kidding me,” you say venomously. “Why the hell would I do that?”

The general seems very relaxed. “Because if you do, we will let you and Laylette free. I’ve seen the way you look at her.” He paused. “If you don’t, you will be sacrificed to the Goddess you refer to as your mother.”

This changes things. The general was actually offering a deal. “Well, shit,” you litter out loud. The general smiles at this. “What exactly do you want to do with this?”

What does the general have in mind?

Plan A: he wants to grow their 1 millimeter population to normal size, your turn your mom into a true goddess while he does it.

Plan B: he wants to shrink anyone who isn’t your mom to their size, starting with anyone inside your house.

Plan C: he had an ulterior motive, and wants to shrink your mom to their size and make her his wife.
113131233223.title: Interrogate you with force if necessary

1131312332232.content:
The general smiled at your question. Whatever his answer was, it couldn’t have been good. “Our world, or what you call your house,” has been dominated by Goddess Jennifer since the start of time. She has been a protector to us without even knowing it. It is our duty to make sure nobody challenges Goddess Jennifer, and she remains the rightful ruler of our world.”

You stare blankly at this general. What in the hell was he talking about. “So I’m not following. Why do you need the shrink ray. My mom owns this house.”

The general continued to grin. “Correction, your GODDESS. You are essentially one of us now.” Those words sent a shiver down your spine.

The general continued. “We need you to help us operate your shrink ray, and shrink anyone else here who isn’t out Goddess.”

You can’t gelieve what you have just heard. They wanted you to shrink anyone else here who wasn’t your mother?! “Are you insane?! I can’t do that to my family!”

The general grinned. “You really don’t have a choice, Josh. If you do not help us, we will kill both you and Laylette. Then we will eventually figure out how to operate your titanic size changing device.” The thought of this was terrifying.

“However, should you choose to help us, you and whomever gets shrunk shall live like royalty, only under the rule of Goddess Jennifer.”

Neither option sounded particularly great, and you had a feeling he was not being completely honest with you. This all sounded too simple, too easy.

“Well,” You say
1131312332232.title: Plan B

11313123322321.content:
“Well,” you say, feeling defeated. “I guess we have a deal,” you say. The general smiles upon hearing this. “But I’m trusting you. Do not double cross me,” you say firmly.

The general walks up to you and pulls out a key, undoing your cuffs. “Josh, let me tell you something,” he says, almost heartfelt. “You are now MY ally. It would be against my best interest to let anything happen to you,” he says, leading you out the backdoor. “Come with me. Laylette will be waiting for you at our headquarters.”

You don’t know if you can trust this guy yet, but you have no other options. Against your better judgment, you follow him into a newer hovercraft. You enter this ship, with approximately 15 other beings on it. “Who are these people?” you ask.

“Everyone, allow me to introduce you to Josh, one of our former gods,” the general says, causing gasps from everyone in the crowd. “Josh, these are some of our highest political, diplomatic, and military leaders. Some are also scientists,” he says.

The tiny aircraft maneuvers its way down to the lower level of your house. The view is absolutely stunning. It’s a perspective you would’ve never even imagined.

The general then leads a scientist up to you. “Josh, we have a device for you,” he says, handing you a strange shaped tablet. When placed on the shrink ray, it allows you to operate it, even at our size. It only works with your living handprint, so you can be sure we will keep you alive,” the general says. This was reassuring at least.

—

As you land near the base of your shrink ray, you still feel disgusted at what you’re about to do. Then again, what choice did you have. These creatures would figure out a use for it eventually, why not at least make peace with them first.

“Okay, Master Josh,” one of the high priests says. “We need you to calibrate the matter reducer sonit shrinks the hexagons who walks in here to our size.”

You want to throw up upon hearing this. The general looks at you sternly, placing one hand on a weapon holstered in his belt. “That’s not a problem, right Josh?” he asks.

You try not to vomit. “No. No sir,” you say. You place the tablet given to you onto the device and begin calibrating it. The device lights up and one point, impressing your tiny onlookers.

After several minutes, it is done. “All set sir, it will reducer the next person coming down to our size.”

“Excellent,” the general says, giving you a firm pat on the back. “And a deal is a deal, Laylette is yours and you are free to go.”

As everyone is boarding the tiny hovercraft, you begin to hear titanic footsteps coming down the stairs.

“Hold on,” the general says, anxious to see the shrink ray in action. Who was walking into the basement?
11313123322321.title: The lesser of two evils

You and the humites find her
113131233223212.content:
The footsteps continue to rock and echo throughout the basement. “Master Josh, prepare to fire,” the general demands. You place your hands on the shrink ray and the device begins to activate. You feel horrible for what you’re about to do.

“HELLO? ANYONE DOWN HERE?” a giant, feminine voice calls out. Your eyes widen as the body of a giantess descends down into your basement. It’s your brother’s girlfriend, Danielle. She is barefoot wearing a blue baseball cap, white tank top, and blue jeans. She looks absolutely stunning, which makes you feel even more guilty.

“Master Josh, fire at this goddess!” the general demands. You close your eyes and hold your breath. You then pull the trigger.

As Danielle stood in the middle of your basement, scrunching her toes against the white carpet fibers, she was suddenly struck by the size ray. “Wait what’s happening?” Danielle screamed as she began to get light headed and felt like she was falling. She suddenly descended down to a measley one millimeter tall, the same size as you.

“Magnificent!” the general and the other high priests say in amazement. They had just seen someone they had once considered a god, reduced to their own height.

“Come on, get in the hovercraft,” the general insists, as everyone boards their spacecraft, you, ashamed of yourself traffic your feet as you board.

Meanwhile, Danielle was in shock at what had just happened. For some reason, she suddenly shrank to the size of a speck. “Someone help me!” she screamed in horror.

What Danielle didn’t realize was that her request was about to be granted. What happened?
113131233223212.title: Your brothers girlfriend, Danielle

The hovercraft flying in front of her eyes
Nothing, she walks away taking danielle with her

Down on the floor, Danielle is having a meltdown. Somehow, she got shrunken to the size of a gnat at one millimeter tall. She started running for her life through the thick carpet, though she had no idea where she was going.

Meanwhile, high up above the ground in the hovercraft, you stand with the general and the rest of the humites, disgusted with yourself. They are using some fancy radar heat signature device to scan the carpet floor and locate Danielle’s tiny body. You shutter at the thought of what these humites would do to Danielle if they captured her.

Suddenly, you hear a deep, rumbling thud. Then you hear it again. You quickly recognize the sound as a pair of feet descending down your basement steps. You smile at these pathetic little humites freaking out at the sound. “Look out, its the goddess!” one of them screams.

It really is. Your eyes widen in amazement as your giant mother, Jennifer enters your basement. She looks more and more like a goddess now, and you can see why these tiny people worship her as one.

Down on the floor, Danielle also turned her attention to the approaching giantess. Her jaw dropped at the sheer size of her boyfriend’s mother. Her monolithic feet stopped much to close to Danielle’s tiny body, causing Danielle to fall on her ass and scream.

“HELLO? DANIELLE ARE YOU DOWN HERE?” your goddess of a mother asks.

Danielle does not hesitate, as her survival instincts kick into high gear. She sprints towards your mothers feet, brushing past strands of carpet while she does so. She reaches your mothers giant, sweaty foot, and begins to climb onto Jennifer’s pinky toe.

Jennifer just stands there with her hands on her hips. “Guess she’s not down here,” she whispers to herself. As your goddess of a mother turns to leave, what does she see?
1131312332232122.title: Jennifer walks into the basement

Danielle watches as her boyfriends mom looks around for her, all of a sudden fear kicks in to her mind. What if she thinks Danielle's a bug or what if she accidentally does something else. All kinds of dangers went into her mind and her veins pumped with adrenaline. But she had to get help and she wasn't going to back out now. As Jennifer turned to leave, Danielle gripped Jennifer's foot with all her might and bit down hard, breaking a small piece of skin off and drawing blood.

This of course, did not hurt Jennifer in the slightest, but it did attract her attention to the strange little prick she just felt on her foot.
Jennifer stopped and looked down on the ground, searching for any object that could have been responsible. Upon finding nothing she looked at the top of her foot to asses the "damage".Jennifer began to kneel down to get a close up view of her foot. Danielle was extremely terrified but knew she needed to keep calm and think.

Odds were that Jennifer wouldn't recognize her at first and attempt to brush her off her foot. If that was the case Danielle would need to act fast and grab onto Jennifer's hand which would hopefully giver her a lift higher up Jennifer's body. The only other scenarios she saw playing out were her getting swept off and possibly killed... or the best case scenario, her getting recognized and receiving help from the giant Jennifer.

A gust of wind and hum of an engine rush past Danielle forcing her to block her face with her arms. Her confusion and fear skyrocketed when she looked forward at the skycraft landing aways in front of her!

The vehicles suicide door lifted open, Danielle fully expected some kind of alien creature to emerge and take her, but instead, the first to exit was her boyfriends little brother... followed by alien creature's.

"Josh? What the hell is happening? Who are they? Why am I..."

Danielle is cut off as you lunge towards her and embrace her in a hug in an attempt to calm her down. She does not fight you, but you can feel the restlessness in her body.

"Dani... you need to come with us okay? Everything will be explained. You just need to come with us."

Danielles hesitantly agreed and let you lead her into the craft. She pressed up against you as you passed the glaring humites, then once everyone was in, the craft took off back to the ray again.

You and Danielle are taken to the general in the rear of the craft, where he us sitting at a desk with a smile. The room they were in was just as dark and dreary as the rest of the vessel, all metallic grey in color and nothing else. Certainly fitting for this bastard.

The general cackles in delight once he lays eyes on Danielle.

"I saw it with my own eyes! A massive goddess reduced to live among us little folk! It worked. Well done Josh!"

Danielle looks to you, searching for an answer as to what that meant. You looked back at her, wracked with guilt at what you have done. Somehow, you were going to get out of this with Danielle and Laylette and warn everyone about this psychopaths plot.

"Now then. Surely you have realized that the rays in need of maintenance. Our experts have seen that the power levels diminish after each activation. With you being this great machines inventor, I would like you to fashion a charging station to keep it functioning. My guards will escort you down."

You try to plead your case that Danielle and Laylette must come with you, but the general is having none of it. “Josh, I don’t think you need them with you to charge the device, and I’m not an idiot. My guards will remain with you, and Danielle and Laylette will stay with me.”

Danielle is freaking out and screaming, trying to seduce what is going on. The last image you see of her is the guards forcing a muzzle on her to stop her from screaming.

As you and the guards reach the ray, you have formulated a plan. You will try to make it look like you’re charging the ray, but will recalibrate it and cause the shrink ray to fife, hopefully growing you back.

While fiddling with the controls, you can hear the guards laughing in the background. “Laugh at this,” you say under your breath.

Who grows back to normal human size?

1131312332233.content:
The general gives you an uneasy smile. “We’d like you to operate the device you refer to as a size ray, and use it on Goddess Jennifer.”

Your eyes widen. “Wait what?!” you shout. “You want me to shrink my own mother?”

Your reaction seems to catch the general off guard. “Please hear me out,” he insists, though you cannot believe the balls on this guy. “We simply wish to communicate with our Goddess, alert her of our existence. After that, you may return her to her original size.”

Something about this wasn’t sitting right with you. First there was the generals tone. It just gave you a bad vibe and you assumed he was lying. Also he was contradicting himself. Why would they return your mom to normal size, yet insist on keeping you at one millimeter tall. Didn’t he realize your mom wouldn’t stand for that?

It made you feel they didn’t intend on restoring your mom’s height once shrunken.

In reality, this was not the generals plan at all. He simply found your Goddess of a mom unbelievably irrestiable and wanted to make her his own bride. The thought of having their Goddess as his wife was both a power move and a lustful decision.

“So, will you help us?” the general asks.

11313123322332.content:
“How stupid do you think I am?” you venomously spit out at the general. He looks surprised, but you continue. “You say you’ll restore her height? Bullshit. You’re not growing me back, so we both know you’re not growing her.”

The general sits there silently.

“And another thing, I’m gonna guess you don’t want her small to communicate. No you creatures worship my mom, you probably want her as a trophy wife, don’t you,” you say. You’re face is red with anger as you wait for the general to respond.

He just sits there across from you, with a sly grin draped across his face. “Well done, Josh,” the general said. “You really are the most intelligent God in the land.”

You couldn’t believe it. You had called his bluff, and you were absolutely right. “Why do you want her, and be honest,” you say, trying to control yourself.

The general shrugged. “Well, it’s quite simple. Your mother is physically beautiful, and also a Goddess. Not only do I find her the most admirable female I’ve ever seen, but marrying her would make her and I rulers of our entire kingdom. You would also be royalty, Josh.”

Was this guy seriously trying to bribe you into shrinking your mom? By saying you could help rule their tiny civilization by all means. “Forget it, not happening. Kill me if you want, but I’m not shrinking my mom.”

The general shifts into a more serious tone. “Josh, we need you to consider something serious. We will kill you, and kill Laylette. But remember, we will figure out your technology eventually, it’s only a matter of time. Eventually, we will have Goddess Jennifer.”

His words cut deep. You did not think this was a bluff at all.

“However, if you decide to cooperate, we will return you to your original size,” he says. Your eyes widen upon hearing this. “You can be our new God. This entire kingdom would be yours, and you could also look after the one you call, your mother.”

The general was now making a somewhat convincing argument. If they killed you, they’d probably find a way to shrink your mom anyway. This was all so much to process. What do you decide to do....

113131233223323.content:
You sigh, near the point of tears. It dawns on you that you have been defeated. Whether or not you refuse to help the general is irrelevant. Deep down you know these people will find a way to utilize your shrinking technology. It is only a matter of time until they get to your mom.

“Okay, I’ll do it,” you say under your breath.

“Excellent, I’m glad we can reach an understanding,” the general says with a smile. “I assume you want to be restored to your original height.

You stare him dead in the eyes. “No, I’m not abandoning my mom,” you say.

The general seems surprised, almost impressed at your loyalty. “Very well, that’s quite admirable of you.” He uncuffs you and leafs you to a separate pod on the ship. “It’ll just be ya operating the shrink ray, no need for all the others to learn its secrets.”

—

You and the general land at the base of your shrink ray. He parks his hovercraft and the two of you emerge from the ship. Your basement looks extremely different from this perspective

The general turns to you. “I don’t want you to hold any ill will against me, Josh,” the general says. “In fact, please call me by my name, Augustus.”

You shoot him a confused look. “That’s abroyal sounding name,” you tease. He actually seems amused by your comment.

“Josh, I have a device for you,” he says, handing you a strange shaped tablet. When placed on the shrink ray, it allows you to operate it, even at our size. It only works with your living handprint, so you can be sure we will keep you alive,” the general says. This was reassuring at least.

After synching the device up to your shrink ray, the table you are on begins to vibrate. You and the general watch on in awe as your Goddess of a mother enters the basement. “HELLO? JOSH ARE YOU DOWN HERE?” she calls out.

“Are you ready Josh?” Augustus asks.

“No, but I will,” you reply meekly, trying to hold it together.

Watching your mom walk into the middle of the room, you know it’s now or never. “I’m sorry mom,” you say, before activating the device.

There’s a bright flash as your mom soon dwindles down in size. When she stops shrinking, she is a near microscopic one millimeter in the carpet of your basement.

“Magnificent!” the general explains, much to your dismay. “Cmon lets go collect the Goddess,” he says, walking to his hovercraft.

You feel absolutely sick to your stomach at what you’ve done. Your mom is probably freaking out in the carpet divers right now.

What happens next?

1131312332233232.content:
The hovercraft you and the general are in lowers down over the forest of carpet. You cannot believe what you have just done, you have reduced your own mother to the size of one millimeter tall; and now some sub-human freak was trying to abduct her to become his wife....with your help.

You observe the general using some type of technology which appeared to be scanning. "What does that do?" you ask.

The general doesn't even look up. "This will scan for a heartbeat. Don't worry, I've located her."

This is bittersweet for you. On one hand, it is great news that your mother is still alive. However, you knew that it meant she would be abducted by this crazed general. Your train of thoughts are interrupted. "I've got a stronger signal now, we're gonna pick her up," the general says.

Down between the carpet strands, your one millimeter mother is trying her best not to have a meltdown. "Alright Jen, stay calm, just try to figure a way out of this," she says to herself. She is brushing past thick strands of shag carpeting, occasionally calling out "Help!" in hopes that by some miracle, somebody would hear her.

Help would soon arrive for your mother, in the form of you and the humite general. A strange, tiny hovercraft appeared over your mother, though it appeared to be normal size for her. The hovercraft released a strange traction beam, pulling your screaming mother up into the ship.

As your mother sat on the floor of the ship, she was shuttering with fear. Then, the door opened, revealing both you and the general.

"Josh!" your mother screamed, and ran up to hug you with a tight embrace. "What's happening?" she sobbed.

You held your mom for about a minute before she noticed the general. Upon seeing this human with abnormally small ears, glowing eyes, and a large nose," she screamed a backed up.

"Goddess Jennifer, do not be alarmed," General Augustus said.

"You....you know who I am?" Goddess?" your mother asked.

"Please allow me to explain," the general insisted. The general began to explain everything, how they had lives here forever and worshipped her as a goddess, the shrink ray, abducting you and Laylette, and ultimately, why he wanted to shrink her down.

"So Goddess, I must ask you, will you be my bride," the general asks.

You have no idea what to think, and from the look of it, neither does your mom. You just want all of this behind you and to be returned to normal size somehow.

What does your mother say?

The general has a confused look on his face. This certainly was not part of the plan. “It must be another God. Can you shrink them?” he asks.

“No I can’t. The shrink ray needs time to recharge,” you lie. Truth be told, you are partially relived another person is entering the basement. Maybe they can help you and your mom.

Meanwhile, Jennifer was in bad shape down on the floor. She had gone from being her normal size just walking through the basement, to running through her carpet at a mere one millimeter tall.

“What the fuck is going on!” Jennifer screamed as she felt her entire world shaking. This was all too much to process right now. Then Jennifer saw it. A massive pair of bare feet descending down the stairs of her basement. Craning her head up, Jennifer could see the body of the person as well.

“HELLO? ANYONE DOWN HERE?” the person boomed. Who was this Goliath in your basement?

1132221.content:
It had to be Jessica. She was the only one in the family who would actively help you with your projects and you think she’d even suggested she’d be willing to help with you with your shrinking experiments.

Although you worked hard not to reveal any details of your work to your family, you were perhaps guilty of being a little unorganised with your notes. You never really saw this as an issue because you arrogantly assumed no one could possibly understand them.

That was until one day a few weeks back at a family dinner when Jessica decided to ask no one in particular, “Wouldn’t it be super cool if you could just shrink yourself, or someone else to a teeny tiny size whenever you wanted?” She then delivered you a grin as if in acknowledgment and in approval before continuing “I think it would be amazing, I would definitely want to use it to explore the world or maybe even the human body.. I would definitely want to make sure I had someone who knew what I was doing though.. for safety, I mean think of all the horrible things that could happen to you if you were five millimetres tall!” All this you knew for sure had been aimed at you. Your stepmom had said something about shrinking her enemies too but you only really took your step sisters words away from that conversation.

You keep that conversation in your head as you approach the door to Jessica’s room. You decided it’s no good trying to communicate with her when your small so you park up your sub on the carpet just outside her room. Opening the door you emerge yourself into the giant world or carpet threads briefly before activating the device using the “return to previous” setting. There was a small flash and you were instantly restored to your average teenage height. You then retrieve the now miniature craft you had just been piloting, grasping it firmly in your palm. You take a deep breathe and prepare to enter Jessica’s room. You feel anxious about the potentially intimate conversation you are about to have.

Eventually you sheepishly knock the door and immediately the familiar voice answers “come in...”. Jessica is sat casually on her bed reading some book about photography, she’s wearing her grey hoody with tight fitting jeans. She gives you a warm smile when you enter as if she had been expecting you.

“Hey bro how’s it going? Been working hard?”

“Hey Sis .. um I mean Jess, um I wanted to um.. well ask for some help with something I’ve been working on... You see I’ve been w...”

before you can finish your Awkwardly prepared speech she interrupts you..

“Do you mean your shrinking project? Josh! Finally!! I’ve been desperate for you to clue me in.... oh my god did you get it working? Have you shrunk anything yet? How small?”

Her excitement intensified with each question and so did yours. She quickly directs you to sit next to her, which of course you oblige.

“Yeah I’ve actually shrunk myself.. and a few other things..”

you then reveal your miniature sub in the middle of your hand to a squeal of excitement.

“You really are a genius Josh! I can’t imagine how huge the world must look when your that small”

she drifts off into her imagination for a half second before turning to look you directly in the eyes.

“What can I do to help with this Josh?

You hesitate before even trying to speak, you felt an excitement like never before. She didn’t seem at all surprised you had successfully shrunk yourself..

“I still need to test it’s original purpose, I need to.. well.. explore a um.. person, and was wondering if... um as you always seemed interested.. and um you well...”

once again she jumped in to save you from your own verbal embarrassment. This time, she places her hand gently on your shoulder.

“Josh.. did you want to explore.... me?

You were struggling to hide your excitement and desire now. All you do in response is smile and look deep into her beautiful eyes.

“It’s ok Josh, to be honest, I’m flattered. This is ground breaking science right? I did tell you to come to me if you needed help didn’t l.. “

She pauses to try and gauge your reaction but you are actually in a state of shock.

“Ok.. how did you plan on doing this Josh?, you will be safe right? Inside me a mean? Also, how were you planning on getting ....in?

After a brief run in with a few curious bugs, you make it to the relative safety of the bustling streets below, landing on top of a parking meter to get a look at possible locations to visit. You knew where you were, the corner of Kapoor and Hughes street, which meant a popular sushi restaurant was just up the street from you. You were a frequent visitor of this place. It was famous for its flame torched aburi-sushi and offered menu items for any situation from power lunches to fancy evening dates.

The subs engines hum back to life and you glide smoothly above the heads of the walking giants as you fly up the sidewalk and sneak inside as a man opens the door for what you could only assume was his date.

The sub rests once again on a small chandelier for you to get a lay of the land. The interior of this place was beautiful! Three by seven rows of tables lined the length of the dining area. Speaking of windows, aside from the left side of the room, which was lined by a eye appealing shade of beige wall with shelves that contained eastern mementos and decorations, most of the restaurant interior was windows, giving fantastic lighting.

But now to the meat of why you were here. The place wasn't too busy, which was understandable for the time of day since most folk of this town enjoyed a bowl cereal as opposed to miso soup or steamed rice for breakfast. But there was still a plethora of good choices here.

As for you, due to a severe lack of planning, the chaos of a panicking giant causes a huge gust of wind to knock you backwards back into the sub and sends it spiraling onto a pillow. You got lucky this time, managing to survive that with only a bruised arm.

“Dude I gotta be honest,” Mitch said, still looking around the shrunken submarine in amazement. “Kari has been really annoying me lately. Can we use this to fuck with her?” Kari was Mitch’s 26-year-old sister. She lived on her own but was currently staying with Mitch and his parents for the week. She often gave Mitch shit for just being young.

You’d be stupid to pass up an opportunity like this. “Sure, if that’s what you wanna do,” you respond. “What did you have in mind?”

Mitch stopped and thought for a second. He did not want to hurt his older sister at all, just screw with her and pull a prank on her. Then an interesting idea popped into Mitch’s mind.

“Alright dude, we’re really fucking small, so what if we entered her body and screwed with her from the inside?” Mitch pitches to you. You just stare curiously wondering what he meant.

“I mean, like we’d film it and send it to her, kinda like the movie Fantastic Voyage or Innerspace. She’d be so confused but wouldn’t be able to explain it.” Mitch seemed very proud of his idea. You had to admit, thenplan wasn’t half bad.

“Alright bro, I like it,” you say, and begin to pilot the ship out of Mitch’s room. You fly down the hallway until you reach the base of the guest bedroom where Kari is staying.

Flying underneath the door, you and Mitch are both taken aback by the sleeping goddess on her bed. She is sleeping on top of the covers in nothing but a long t-shirt and pair of panties. “Oh shit,” you whisper to yourself, embarrassed to see that Mitch had caught you staring at his older sister.

“Let’s just get inside,” Mitch says with a laugh. You do as instructed, and begin to fly lower, looking for the best point of entry.

“Alright,” you say, steering the ship lower. “I’m gonna have us enter her body through her....

Your excitement to see this whole new world had you make up your mind in a hurry. Though taking the sub outside could prove dangerous due to the birds and bugs everywhere, you felt the subs defense systems would suffice in keeping you protected. But perhaps later on you could rob the local gun store and shrink an rifle down just for reassurance. You guide the sub down to your backyard, wanting to land it in the field of grass and explore it like a jungle. On your way down you notice your older sister Jess was sitting on the deck reading a book with a cup of coffee next to her on the table.

You weren't expecting anyone one to be out here this early in the morning but seeing as how it was Jess you weren't very surprised. She isn't the kind of woman to sleep in on any day.
