You exit the sub, armed only with your pocket knife and a compass that you kept in a glove compartment and began your trek, staring in total awe at the 30 foot tall blades of grass that surrounded you at all sides.

"This is like having a rain forest in my own backyard! It's incredible!", you say to yourself.

Up ahead through the trunks of green, you notice a lone dandelion sticking out and towering above all the other plants of the yard. As you approach to get a closer look...
113332.title: Explore outside

115.content:
So far, everything was going just according to plan. Your hands are quivering with excitement as you pull out your cell phone and fire off a text towards your good buddy Mitch. "Dude, you gotta check this out. This is unbelievable!"

After less than a minute your phone vibrates, signaling a reply. "Sweet. Be there in a few." You knew you could always count on your buddy Mitch to be there when you needed him.

After about ten minutes you hear a car park outside your house and it's door shut. You walk up to the door and open it, not wanting Mitch to ring the bell and let everyone home wake up.

"Hey, what's up man," Mitch said, grabbing your hand and bringing you in for a bro hug.

"Well, we're winning the science fair this year," you say, realizing how nerdy that sounded. "Seriously though, this thing is awesome!"

Mitch smiled as you lead him downstairs. "Cool, can't wait." There was an awkward pause before me let out a laugh. "Stylish lab coat by the way."

As the two of you enter the basement, Mitch's eyes widen when he sees the magnificent ray inside of him.

"This thing actually works?" he asked.

"Sure does," you reply. "Watch." You dial the settings down to 5 millimeters and aim again at the rat. As soon as you pulled the trigger, the rat dwindled away.

"Woah!" Mitch exclaimed, rushing up to the cage. He could see the 5 millimeter rat scurrying around trying to escape. "Can it grow things back?"

"Yep," you laugh, and reverse the entire process. The look on Mitch's face is priceless to you right now.

"Bro this is aweomse," he says, shaking his head. "Does it work on people?"

You pause upon hearing that question. You hadn't tested it on a person yet, but why shouldn't it?

"Yeah it should," you say.

Before you can do anything you hear the basement door open. "Todd, are you down here?" It was your mom Jennifer. She slowly began walking down the stairs.

However, in a panic to hide the device, you accidentally pull the trigger. The shrink ray discharges, and shrinks who to 5 millimeters tall?
115.title: call Mitch over

choices: Mitch gets stuck to her toe
You stop her and warn her
1151.content:
After the bright flash of light, you can feel your heart stop for a second. You are expecting to be the size of a tiny bug on the floor, probably five millimeters tall like that rat. But as your vision returns, that is clearly not the case. No, everything seems to be normal, except....Mitch!

Lookin around you realize Mitch was the one struck by the shrink ray. Hearing your moms descending footsteps, you panic and begin scanning the floor, desperate to find your tiny, tiny friend.

After several seconds, your eyes spot something on the floor when Mitch was just standing. That had to be him! However, before you could make a move, you mom entered the basement.

"Hey honey, what's up?" she asked, walking up to you to give you a kiss. You just stood there, paralyzed in fear as her beautiful bare slapped the ground and came just short of your shrunken friend.

"What do you have here, Josh?" she asked, motioning to your shrink ray.

"I....uh...it's just something for the science fair," you stammer.

Your mom smiles at you. "Annnnnnd...whats it do? Are you gonna keep me in suspense?" she laughs.

You really do not feel like revealing what it does to your mom just yet. "Well it's not up and working yet, but it'll be a surprise," you say.

Jennifer just shakes her head at you. "You are so smart," she says and turns to walk away. As she does this, she lifts her foot directly over Mitch and begins to bring it down.

You watch in horror as what happens?

You freeze on the spot. You hadn't expected to provide an explanation for your mom. But at least Mitch was relatively safe right now.

"Josh, I asked you a question. Why did you just yell?" your mother asked sternly. She scrunched her toes, nearly crushing your best friend in the process.

"I ummm, I thought I saw a bug," you stutter, hoping your mom will believe you. You shoot a pretend confused look down at the floor. "I don't see if anymore."

Jennifer is suspicious but looks down. She doesn't see any bugs, but maybe Josh was just mistaken. "Well if you say so," she says. She catches you still looking at her feet and still looks confused. "Josh, sweetie, everything okay? You keep staring at my feet."

You snap back to reality. "Oh I....:I uhh...love your nail polish. It looks nice," you say.

Your mom smiles at you. "Okay sweetie, don't work too hard," she says and plants a kiss on your cheek. She then starts to walk away, carrying your best friend off with her. She walks over to the couch on the basement and lays down

With a deep exhale, your try to relax. "Okay, mom's got Mitch, trapped between her toes. No big deal," you think to yourself. You know you have to find a way to rescue mitch before he is crushed.

Your mom seems pretty distracted by the tv. You could try to shrink yourself and go over to her or try to remove him at normal size. What do you do?
115122.title: Lie to her

1151221.content:
After sitting down next to your mom and subtly staring at her feet that were lounged on the farthest arm rest from your position. From 9 feet away, it was nearly impossible for you to find your speck of a friend on your mothers foot, who for all you knew wasn't even here anymore. But nonetheless, you would have to get closer. Maybe if you gave her a foot massage?

"*ahem*, hey mom?"

"Yeah?"

"Your feet look pretty worn out. Could I... give you a massage?"

Your mom looks back at you confused.

"What is your obsession with my feet today?"

"Oh great. I creeped her out.", you thought to yourself. "No no I dont have an obsession! I just thought maybe..."

"Thats uh... sweet of you but I'm okay."

"Okay... haha... i was just kidding anyway."

Your mom goes back to watching her love island show. Obviously wanting to forget about what just happened.

You retreat for now back into your thoughts.

"Fuck. Alright then, Plan B. Dont worry Mitch, I'm coming for you."

You quietly get off the chair and pull the shrink ray out of your pocket, setting it to shrink you down to 5 mm tall. With the light feet of a cat, you crouch walk around the back of the couch she was on, towards her resting feet. You study the soles of her feet, that area of the couch and floor for any signs of Mitch. He wasn't anywhere you could see, so you figured hes somewhere on your mom, probably heading for her head to get her attention. But at his size, that would take him too long. She could get up any moment. You needed to find him quick.

Waiting for an opportune moment, you wait until your mom seemed completely engaged in her show, until you stealthily jumped straight up into the air and fired the shrink ray on yourself, quickly reducing your size to that of a flea. Thanks to your perfectly timed jump, as you shrunk down in midair, you were actually brought closer to the tips of your mothers toes, landing with a soft thump on her biggest. You needed a moment before rising to your feet to catch your breath from the absolute adrenaline pumping through you from that experience. A part of you couldn't really believe that you were now so tiny that you can stand on the tip of your mothers toe and still compare it to the length of a basketball court!

Slowly, you begin to stand up. Once you did, you were back to fighting to catch your breath. Seemingly miles up ahead, was the ginormous face of your relaxing mother, completely unaware to the plight of her tiny son and his tiny friend. Your "tiny" mind could hardly comprehend the sheer massive scale that your kind, gentle mother had now become to you. Stepping carefully towards the wall that was the toenail, you hoist yourself on top and look down at the steep slope of the top of her foot below you. There was no sign of Mitch anywhere, so you call out to him.

"MITCH!!!"

No response, just the background chatter of the reality show contestants on the tv.

"WHERE ARE YOU!!!"

Again, no response.

If he couldn't come to you, you would have to go for him.

You think about it, and come up with something that meets both sides in the middle.

You take the suit off and put it in a duffel bag then tell Jess and Brad you'll be back soon as you head out the door and walk to Mitchs house.

After a two minute walk you arrive on his property. The garage was pretty big; Mitch, his dad, and some of of their extended family and friends helped them build it behind the house. Mitch and his dad were both braniacs so they shared it for their work.

You walk up to the garage and let yourself in, then wait for Mitch to turn up. You set the bag on one of the counters and take a seat. It isnt long before Mitch is walking through the door and greeting you with the secret handshake the two of you came up with as kids.

"So whats this big secret you were talking about?", he asks.

You give Mitch a look of anticipation, pull the bag closer and open it up.

"This right here... this is a suit, and this suit, once you put it on, gives you the ability to shrink, fly, shrink others and so much more."

"Are you being serious right now?"

"Completely! The thing is though, there was an incident with Brad and now Jess says if you could put in some failsafes she'll let me keep it."

Mitch took the suit out and began inspecting it.

"Jeez. This tech is out of this world. Maybe you are telling the truth. Alright let me see what I can do."

For the next couple of hours, you watch as Mitch tinkers with the suit, explaining that the suit had an onboard computer built in to control its functions, meaning that Mitch could probably upload things like facial recognition programs to limit the number of people who could pilot the suit.

14113.content:
“Why not pay Anna a visit?” You grin as you zip down the hallway, toward a gargantuan white door. Your malcontent of a younger sister had been especially bratty in the last few days. As always, you had been the primary victim of her barrage of teenage ire. You decide this is the perfect opportunity to get some payback.

The door is barely cracked, but that's more than wide enough for at least a dozen people your size to enter at once. For the first time in awhile, you enter the forbidden territory of your sibling’s bedroom. It’s an alien cavern of pinks and purples, the beige carpet littered with clothes. Her dresser is dominated by a flatscreen TV that looms over a small cityscape of makeup, hair, and skin products. Staying focused on your destination, you fly past the lamp on her nightstand. Ahead is the vast plateau of Anna's bed.

You're a bit taken aback as you approach. Seeing inanimate objects in otherwise empty rooms at the size of a flea was downright daunting. To see an actual human being, however, was another thing entirely.

Anna is a living breathing landscape. She's covered mostly by her bedsheets, her body creating rolling hills and valleys under the purple comforter. Her mighty arms and shoulders, tanned a healthy shade of bronze, are exposed by a grey tank top. Charcoal-colored hair is woven into a single braid so long it disappears under the covers. As powerful as she seems, you can't help but chuckle at your step sister's less-than-graceful sleeping position. She's on her belly with her mouth hanging open, allowing thick drool to ooze onto the pillow.

You prepare to land, descending toward her huge head. “This is one small step for Josh…” You snicker as your feet touch down on the wide, golden-brown plain of her cheek. It’s still pretty soft with youth and your boots sink into her skin. Anna’s light snores rumble through the plush ground, shaking what would've been a serene sideways visage. You make sure you find your footing before...
14113.title: You Snooze, You Lose

choices: The Right Path (Shopping Mall) or other
1412.content:
You decided to test this baby out outside because you thought that you'll have plenty of freedom to test the features of this suit plus you plan to shrink yourself and travel around the neighborhood, the thought of that sounds pretty exciting.

You turn on the screen on your wrist again and noticed the second option, which featured a pair of plane-like wings of some sort.

"Let's try this one."

You press the button and suddenly, you feel something popped out of your back. You look at the mirror and noticed the exact same wings on your back. You realized that the button you press active some type of gliders to control your flight when using the jetback which is on your back.

You open the window and prepare to fly out. You actived the jetpack (by pressing two buttons next to your sides) and fly outside.

"WOOHOO!!!"

"AHHHH!!!"

You immediately landed into a nearby tree due to your carelessness. After that, you fell down onto the ground.

"Looks like I have so much to learn right now..."

You got up and brush the dirt of your suit. You look around to see where you could start your small adventure.

In the front of you lies the home of the Smith family; your neighbors. Despite that, you don't know very much about them. The only thing you know is that the thirty something year old couple have a seventeen year old daughter, a ten year old daughter, and a seven year old son. To point this simply, they're just an average family of five. The house looks just like your own, but it looked a little bigger so maybe you could have some fun around their home while shrunken especially since you never seen what the inside looks like. You also heard that they have a swimming pool so maybe you could go take dip if you feel like (and also check if your new suit was waterproof).

You look to your left which leads to the park that's was not so far from here. The park was large and vast so it could make a pretty neat place to explore. It was a typical park full of whatever you usually find in most parks (playgrounds, sporting fields, lakes etc). You could simply shrink yourself and travel around like you are almost in the middle of a open wilderness as an insect. Speaking of insects, you hope that this suit have some cool weapons to protect you from giant hungry bugs.

Looking to your right, you thought of starting your shrunken journey inside the shopping mall that was somewhere there. The mall has many thing you usually find in other malls such as a food court, a theater, several shops, and many more. It was very huge too; big enough to have two floors. You'll probably have an awesome adventure and have so much fun depending on what part of the mall you are on. There were many choices but you will have get there and choose for yourself.

Which will it be?
1412.title: To The Outside World

14121.content:
Looking at the house ahead, you decided to infiltrate your neighbor's house by shrinking yourself tiny. You wonder what their home have in store for you since you never went inside it. You'll simply have to find that out yourself and hopefully have something fun for you to do.

You press the shrinking option on the screen and began to shrink down, just like from before. Next, you press the option which actives the gliders on your back; you were ready. "Here goes nothing!" you said and you activated the jetpack. You lift yourself high up and try to angle yourself on top of your mailbox. Along the way, you manage to carefully steer the jetpack to your destination; it seems you are slowly getting the hang of it.

Landing on top of your mailbox, you get a better look of the house itself and see where will you start your fun at. Being small, you could just simply crawl underneath the door and into where you presumed the living room. You could try to go to the backyard and either try entering the house from there or check out the swimming pool. At the house, you notice an open window; maybe you could seek entry to the house from there but you'll probably won't know what room it leads to.

What kind of entry are you using?
14121.title: To The Smith Household

choices: You cause some mischief around here
You quickly got bored here and leave to find another house
141211.content:
You made your mind up and flew your way to the house to crawl underneath the door. Even though you were getting the hang of it, you still have some bit of trouble adjusting the speed and as a result of that, slammed face-first into the door. You fall into the ground with a bunch of stars around your head. You shake the stars away and got down to the floor in order to get inside by crawling underneath the door.

After doing just that and getting inside, you got up and look around. Just like you expected, it lead to the living room as you can see the couch, TV, and other things. However, you noticed that everything was absolutely quiet. It sounds like everyone is currently out of town or something; maybe there's at least someone here but what ever they are doing, they doing something that's very quiet.

What do you do now?
141211.title: A Quiet House

1412112.content:
"It's little quiet here...." You said and then you gave a huge grin. "I wonder if I could give this place a little makeover...hehehe."

With your new suit, you could use it to cause some absolute mayhem around here. You were very mischievous and always like the idea of messing around with people and their stuff. Seeing how quiet it is around here as well as the suit you are wearing, you finally have been given chance to do so.

You look around the house on where to start your destruction. The living room is an obvious choice as it is the first thing you saw. However, there's also the kitchen nearby, but you were more interested in going upstairs and vandaling one of the bedrooms.

Where do you start?
1412112.title: House Destruction

14121123.content:
"Nah, screw being around here, I'm gonna go start sweet chaos in one of their room." You said and with a chuckle, you use your jetpack to fly up the stairs, but not before you get your head hit by the ceiling and fall down onto the floor.

After rubbing both your head and ass at the same time, you got up and look around. The question is, where will you start first?

There's the door that leads to the master bedroom which belonged to the parents. There's also the two rooms owned by the daughters and one by the young son.

Which one do you start your destruction?
14121123.title: Bedroom Chaos

choices: Gon on to the next room
141211232.content:
Judging by the the bright decor of the room you entered, this would be the ypungest daughters room, unless the older had an unhealthy obsession with pony's for a girl her age. But you doubted it. Considering one of the few times you had a run in with this girl she was wearing a sundress speckled with little horses all over it. You would have thought she looked adorable if she wasnt such an annoying neighbour! With her regular tantrums that can be heard from her house to my room like some kind of wailing banshee.

Let it not be said that you were one to let an opportunity for a little payback pass you by. Perhaps a little good ol'fashioned destruction of property would make you feel a little better. You knew full well thus would more than likely result in another tantrum, but you didnt care. You had a feeling you would enjoy hearing this one.

You rub your hands together with giddiness and take off like a bullet with a easy enough target to start the mayem with. A happy little marble pony sat peacefully on a shelf above the fancy white headboard of her queen sized bed. You rocketed up to its horsey head and superman kicked hard enough to cause it to rock back and forth. Following its momentum, you waited for it to lean off the shelf, and with a final shove, sent it tumbling to its demise, smashing ots head off the headboard and coming to its final resting place right on the bed pillow.

Pieces of marble littered the neatly made bed, and the decapitated horse head landed rough on the floor away from its body.

A gang of pleasant emotions filled your soul. This was too fun to stop! Without hesitation you continued on your path of destruction!Hovering above her computer desk, growing to full size and smashing it in half with your weight! Raiding her dresser and throwing clothes everywhere before tipping it over! Grabbing a bottle of nail polish and splashing it on her window like a crime scene! Just a few of the many low blows you commited against this girl.

After a while, there was little left to destroy.
141211232.title: A Little Vandalism

1412112322.content:
After patting yourself on the back, you give the room another good once-over, searching for anything else left you could defile; in doing so, you also take in just how much destruction you've caused. Her room was in ruins, but you can't help but feel like there's one thing you're missing...

Suddenly, your gaze is drawn back to the bed that the broken marble pony statue rested on. It was lavishly decorated; the covers were large and fluffy, and the edges and corners are lined with toys and plushies--more ponies, of course--and the entire thing was in perfect condition, save for the pieces of marble still littered there. Oh, this was perfect! If there was anything you could wreck that would leave a pretty deep cut, it'd definitely be this! You grow back to normal size, and tear the pretty and probably very expensive blanket right off the bed. It has a large, white unicorn with a rainbow-colored mane right on the center of it, with the rest of the bedding being pink. Uncapping another bottle of nail polish, you get to work, haphazardly spreading the pink liquid all over the fantasy creature's body and mane in sloppy, uneven blotches. To add a finishing touch, you dot some polish over the eyes and draw a sharp-toothed smile where the unicorn's muzzle.

Then you grab the trashcan in the corner of the room, and start dumping it out onto the bed and floor, taking care to get the brunt of the waste onto the blanket, still on the ground. Apparently, she was using glitter for something, because boatloads of the stuff were dumped out along with candy wrappers, chip bags, and crappy discarded arts & crafts projects. The carpet was stained with art supplies, and it'd take weeks to get all of the gunk out of there. Not only that, the blanket was completely ruined! She'd be in tears when she comes back!

Laughing maniacally to yourself, you make your way back to the hallway. You've run out of stuff to do in the younger sister's room; that last hurrah was pretty much the apex of your rampage; anything else would just be chasing that high. Besides, you were getting kinda bored messing around with her anyways.

Now, which of your annoying neighbor's rooms should you trash next?
1412112322.title: Finish the job

141212.content:
You choose to go and start your journey in the backyard of the Smiths. You activated your jetpack once more and blasted your way towards the house. Even though you got the hang of steering this thing, you still have some bit trouble while trying to speed forward since the previous attempt was trying to rocket upwards from the ground. But nonetheless, you pushed on and try your best to master it.

Once you got near the house, you slowed down a bit to look at it below. You watch as it slowly passes underneath you as you go. "Quite nice house they got there." You said "I just wonder what could I find inside there once I'm done doing something in the backyard." The house passes by you and you see the yard from above. On the middle of it, you can see the pool, now even larger than you ever seen before. As a matter of fact, it looks more like a lake than a pool.

You stop speeding forward and began to make a touchdown to the yard. Where did you land on?

You wanted to get a close look on that large swimming pool so you carefully angle yourself down next to it. Unfortunately, you accidentally let go of the two buttons and fell down to the ground which was a rough landing for you, but thankfully it was only slight injury (it's still hurts though).

"Ouch!" you shouted after you landed your ass on the hard concrete; you still haven't quite got the hang of it yet. You stood up from the ground and look at the enormous pool in front of you. Your expectations were correct; it does indeed looks so much like a lake at this size than a pool as it stretches for miles in all three directions. They sure know how to keep it shipshape as possible."

Just as you where about to check, you suddenly thought of something. Kinda think of it, you haven't seen anybody yet so are you alone at the moment? You just want to make sure so that you either won't get spotted or someone could enter the pool while you swam around.

You look beyond the pool and on the patio to see...

The girl lounges on a sun chair with two others
You exit the belly button now

The patio door open, unleashing a frenzy of hyper pre-teens spilling out like a flood. You counted seven of the monsters and judging by their swim wear they would be coming your way for a pool party. That's a lot of stomping feet that in a matter of seconds, that were going to be right on top of you if you didn't move your ass NOW. You start to fly high into the air but its too late. Through the chaos you can here your neighbors father yell in vain for them to stop running around the pool. The strong scent of lingering lint fought against your helmets filter and your visor fogged from the sheer body heat. The vibrations from her feet stomping shook through her flesh and into you You use the control panel to cool your suit and purge the smell from the filter, which surprised you because you didn't expect all the suits functions to work after such a beating.

With some difficulty, you free yourself from the squishy flesh and look out the exit of this cave. From your point of view, it appeared like the girl you were in was standing on the deck of the pool watching all her friends jump in first while performing front flips, dives and squealing loud enough that you thought your ears would bleed. You walk on the soft floor towards the edge of the naval and...

The three suddenly got up to join the others at the pool

You active the set of gliders, planning to use your jetpack to fly out of the navel, but you need to wait until she gets there since you don't want to get smacked against her while she walks.

The girl eventually got to her friends and sat down on the sun chair to catch some rays. You immediately rocket out of her belly button just as she lies down and away from her gaze when she closes her eyes.

After all of that, you slowly go on the ground, near the three resting preteens. You finally got a good look at the same girl that you hitch a ride on. She has long brunette hair and wears a yellow and green two-piece. Looking at the other two girls besides her, you can also see their appearances well. The one on the left has red curly hair, freckles, and wears a light-blue swimsuit. The one on the right is pale-skinned and has black hair tied by a ponytail; she wears a red two-piece.

You look at the swimming pool behind which now has four girls playing on it. You could go and take a swim like you were going to, but you have no idea how can you do so with them swimming around. You look back the three resting girls and thought about something else.

"Hmm....since I'm quite small and they're just laying around...I wonder if I could...hee hee...have some fun on them." You said, chuckling to yourself. You don't have any ideas what to do on them yet, but you'll might have some when you get there.

What happens next?
141212222.title: Play Or Swim

choices: You spotted something deep on the pool floor
You hear voices coming from above the surface
You eventually got out of the pool
14121223.content:
There was nobody around here at this moment. This was good since you'll be able to swim around without interruptions so with that, you lower your right foot into the surface to see if the suit can withstand the water. After a few moment, you lift your foot out of the pool and saw that your suit was perfectly fine. Next, you dip your wrist that has the screen put on into the pool to check if it could work underwater. Surprisingly, it does as you turn it on and can see the screen. Moving your hand away from the pool, you realized that it was indeed waterproof and you can now go swimming in the pool. You backed away from the pool for a bit and come back running towards it. "HERE I GO!!!!!" You shouted and dive into the water with a big splash (At least from your point of view).

You swam up to the surface after taking a dive and started swimming around the pool. "So refreshing..." You said to yourself as you make your way to the very end of the pool before swimming to the center part; it was very fun. Once you got there, you turn the screen from your wrist on and began to search for something that can help you breathe underwater. You soon found an option which featured a silouette wearing an air helmet which serve as a tool for receiving air below the pool. You active the option and just like that, an air helmet suddenly appeared over your head. You dive underwater to test it and you're able to breathe underwater. Now you have the necessary tool, you began your underwater adventure.

You swim around the water and was having a blast exploring it. It was just like sea diving, but even better now that you got an awesome suit that makes you do all kind of things. You active your jetpack to see if it works here and it works, but as a jet propeller. "Woohoo" You yelled as you jet around the water like a squid; you were having WAY too much fun in here.

A voice is heard from an intercom next to the doors
You decided to find a different way of entering it
141212231.content:
After several minutes of sloshing around, you finally stop when your eyes caught something down below the pool floor; at the very corner. The reason it got your attention was because it was bright enough to be seen (at least from your currently tiny size) from where you are. You don't know what kind of object is currently sitting there but you believe it must be an item that has fallen into the pool and sank to the bottom but then again, why would something so small managed to sink down? You were getting pretty curious of what it is so you swam down and go towards the mysterious object.

As you got closer and closer, you began to notice that it was circular in shape and you can see some other objects near it that were just as bright. Getting much closer, you realized that it was transparent which housed something inside it along with the other nearby objects. Is this a dome of some kind? Why is it here?

When you finally got closer to it, you realized that the dome has some kind of structure that resembled a city whom you thought it was replica of some sort. "Just how did this dome got here?" You asked yourself. Wanting to take a close look at this supposed model, you swam further down, planning to get and stand on top of it.

You land on the glass after you got there and look below to get a close look. The city looks highly futuristic and it was very bright with a bunch of neon lights, but how is that possible? It didn't take very long to find the answer when you saw something unexpected from inside the dome.

Within the dome, you saw several flying cars soaring across the city and that's not all, you also saw what looks like people from very down below; walking on the streets. You can tell that because the lights helped you see human-like shapes even thought you can't yet see what they look like. You don't believe what you are looking at! This isn't a model; this is a real-life tiny city that was settled on the floor of this swimming pool! It's not just a single city though as you can see other dome cities near it that were all connected to the main one by a series of pipes; it was a large underwater civilization!

As you decided to swim to the floor and try to get inside the dome, your head was full of questions. What was this city doing around here? Does your neighbors know about it? And was it always that small or did it got shrunken and placed here for unknown reasons?

You got to the floor and already you saw a metal double door that leads to the city. You swim to the doors and look at it for a few seconds.

What happens next?
141212231.title: Dome City

As you walk to the park, you began to wonder who was this person or group that wanted this suit so badly. "Probably jealous of this invention, I mean who doesn't? This suit is pretty awesome!" you said smiling. You look around, wondering if anybody staring at you due to the odd outfit you are wearing. However, the streets are empty right now so you don't want to worry too much.

"Woah! Woah! WOAH!!!!"

You tried to steady your flight as much as you can and make for the nearby tree near to the gates. You clumsily land on the branch with a thud; almost enough to make your ass sore. "All pain but no gain." you said to yourself. You got up to your feet and look at the scenery.

The park was huge of course as it stretches on for miles even at normal-size. You search for something to explore around here, maybe some place that'll make it feel like you are in an open wilderness.

You spot a nearby playground that was currently empty right now so maybe you could play with your new size there. You look some more and see some sort of party going on near a lake; you could check it out to see if they have some delicious food to eat or play in the lake if you want. You notice a location in the park involving physical activities such as a running track so you could use there and try to test out some other features this suit have.

Where will you go?

You get off the hand in time
141222212.content:
Just as your head breaches the water, you are met by a hard collision with the knee of one of the girls as she charged through the water. You were now plastered against her skin, forced to ride along with her swinging legs as she ran deeper and deeper into the lake.

Eventually, the girl was deep enough to slow her down, allowing you to scrape yourself off her skin and float limply under the water. You were to disoriented to do anything. You could only drift with the current as the girl dragged her hands through the water to splash her friends.

Once again, you feel your body collide against flesh but at a much slower pace than before. The girl had caught you in the motion of her hand to splash water and you were now flat against to center of her palm!
141222212.title: One of them runs into you

14123.content: It was too early in the morning for anything to be going on at the mall. Perhaps you could think of somewhere else to go or even just wait and bring the suit to school?
14123.title: An early morning

choices: You spot one of your friends
You just wait there until the bus arrives at school
141232.content:
You just had to bring this thing to school! Who could possibly pass up an opportunity like this?! The only thing was the buses wouldnt be around until around 8:15 and last time you checked it was not even 6. Well, that just means more time to learn what this baby was capable of!

You could obviously already cross shrinking and flying off the list of abilities, not mention the super advanced "heads up display" on the visor of the helmet. This was definitely something a super hero billionaire would wear. According to the HUD, the integrity of your suit was at 100% and so was the power. A list bar of other features also appeared in the corner of the visor, but since this wasnt touch screen you had no clue how to open it to view inside.

"Hm... maybe its voice command?... Open list bar?"

With a "beep", the outline of the list lit up green and enlarged enough that you could read it without it blocking your vision.

"Whoa! Nice! What do we have here? Shock gauntlets... flamethrower... arm blade? Damn this thing is a war machine!... Okay, i guess first ill use... the flamethrower!"

A panel on the wrist of the suit opened up to reveal a tube about the size of your finger. You pointed your arm out into the air and squeezed your fist, watching a torrent of fire blast out of the tube! You ened up having so much fun just playing with the weapons and flying around that you didnt even realize that it was almost 8:30 until you heard the familiar sound of the bus engine on the other side of your house!

"Oh dammit! Gotta move!"

You deactivated the weapons and flew up and over your house. It wasnt hard to spot the big yellow vehicle approaching its stop where a couple of students were standing, so you went down to street level and sped over towards the now open door. The last student in the lineup stepped onto the bus but you managed to grab onto the back of their shoe right before the doors shut!

You let go of the shoe and flew up to the rear view mirror for a look around.
141232.title: Bring it to school

1412323.content:
After several minutes of riding the shaky, loud bus, it finally pulled into the school parking lot and opened its doors allowing to exit and fly back up high into the air.

Four other buses full of students pulled in and dropped them off. From the height you were at it almost looked like they were a swarm of ants, which felt kind of ironic to you. But speaking of ants, you were pretty sure birds liked to eat them... and speaking of birds, you better find some place to land before one of them swoops in and gobbles you up.

With the todays weather being so sunny and warm, those bastards were sure to be pretty active today.

You look around for a place to go and...
1412323.title: Arriving at School

choices: The suit is in worse shape than you thought
You are spotted! Time to reveal yourself
Stick around and have some fun
14123231.content:
From way high in the sky, you saw a piece of land surrounded by the school architecture. A flat grassy area, adjourned with wooden lunch tables (around 6), and a large lively tree that provided shade to a quarter of those benches. From what you could see, some of those benches appeared to be occupied.

You pilot the suit down to an overhanging branch on the tree for a closer overlook of the area and find a few familiar figures in your peripherals.

On a bench bathed in sunlight, smack dab in the middle of the courtyard, you saw your friends and each others best friends, McKenzie and Sophia, along with other mutual friends, Andrew, Dylan and Cassidy, all seated together and cramming to get homework finished before first period.

Careful not to attract any attention, you hover down to the table and pick a moment when none of them are paying attention to the tabletop or the objects on it, to find a spot on the tabletop and land on it.

At one point, as you buzzed around waiting, you found yourself passing behind Kenzies head as she flipped her long hair to put it into a ponytail, sending thousands of strands of hair your way from below. Each one slams into your puny body like towel whips. If it wasnt for the suits protection, these hairs could very well have pummeled you to death.

Unfortunately, though the suits protection worked well for you, it hadnt gone so well for the suit. The thrusters that kept you in the air had started to malfunction! You would need to land before you lost control, and quick.

With great haste, you direct yourself down to the table and with a rough landing, touch down ontop of Kenzies science textbook just in time for the thrusters to puke out one final gasp of air before dying.

"Ah shit! Come on!", your dissapointment was beyond immeasurable. The best thing about this suit aside from its shrinking ability was the flying. If you couldnt get this fixed, it was gonna crush your soul.

But, you'll cross that bridge when you come to it. For now, you had to plan on what to do next now that a means for an easy escape was busted. Maybe its time to take a break from the suit for awhile before something unfortunate happens to you.
14123231.title: Lovely School Courtyard

choices: Tell the truth and your situation
Tell the truth but bask in the attention
141232312.content:
Kenzie twiddled with the pencil in her hand as she studied her notes. With her homeroom class being Chemistry, and there being a test scheduled for today, she needed to cram as much knowledge on the subject as she could. Luckily, her friends consisted of absolute brainiacs, which is why she enjoyed studying with them. However, when it came to chemistry, Andrew was top of the class.

"Hey Andy?", she asked. "Do you know what the atomic number, or whatever, of cardon is?"

"Carbon? Yeah its six. I think on page twelve in the text book theres a periodic table that tells you all about all of the elements.", Andrew glanced down at her textbook, spotting a tiny moving figure on its hard cover. "But uh, you might want to swat that bug off it first."

Your posture snapped straight in reaction to what you just heard. As you were just starting walk off the book, you turned around to look back up at the titaness Kenzie, you were met with a sight that filled you to the bones with fear! Her face had a look of minor disgust as she looked down at you. But to you it was like staring at a goddess who was about to snuff out your life like it was nothing!

Her penciless hand began to rise off the table and moved above then over you! The sun was blocked by a her hand and the sky above you became a great expanse of flesh that was her palm growing closer and closer as it threatened to flatten you! It was getting so close that you could see her palm in great detail! Which ofcourse meant if you didnt do something so, your time here on earth was nigh on done!

It took you an embarrassingly long time to remember that the suit had built in speakers to enhance the volume of your voice enough that you could be heard. You would have slapped yourself in the forehead if you had the time for it, but Kenzies hand was far to close to waste even a second. You reach your hand up to the chin of the helmet and press a small button. With a low hum, the speakers activate!

"WAIT WAIT KENZIE STOP!!!", you scream.

The crushing hand was so close you had to attempt to hold it up yourself as its impossible weight reached your raised hands and buckled your knees under its immense strength before coming to a halt! She stopped? She heard you? You couldnt believe you actually survived! One second late and you would have been made into a pancake!

Kenzies hand retreated slightly but still hovered above.

"Did you guys see who said that?", Kenzie asked.

Her friends collectively agreed that they had no clue. There were other people around at other benches, but that voice sounded like it came from their table.

"Are we being pranked right now?", said Dylan.

They all were surprised once again when the disembodied voice spoke a second time.

"Um... hehe... Kenzie? Could you lift your hand away from me please?"

The group all focused their attention to their confused friend, then down to her hovering hand.

"Go on, move your hand.", urged Sophia.

With hesitation, Kenzie moved her hand away from the textbook, only to see nothing but that bug she was about to smush.

"Okay,... sooooo why did I have to do that?", she asked as she looked around, hoping to spot the mystery speaker.

"Well, because im kind of standing on your text book and I dont want you to crush me."

All of the giants eyes widened as they all leaned over towards the text book to get a closer look save for Kenzie. A mixture of gasps and "Holy shits" rang out as they each came to realize this bug was shaped like a human!

"Hey guys.", you said while awkwardly waving your hand in greeting.

"Oh my God," Kenzie whispers, her pencil dropping onto her notebook and bouncing of the bindings, ringing in your ear as if she just dropped a ton of bricks on a steel floor.

It was a mixture of feelings between spine-tingling and breathtaking to see all these giant faces and giant eyes surrounding you with looks of wonderment. If you were being honest, you kind of liked the attention. You could do without Cassidys breath hitting you like waves however... would it kill her to back off a little bit. She wasnt even giving Kenzie any space, with her body pressed against her arm.

Speaking of Kenzie, she was the first one to break the silence.

"Who... who are you?"
141232312.title: You are spotted! Time to reveal yourself

choices: Kenzie wants you to help her cheat on the test
1412323122.content:
Oh boy here you go. You're about to identify yourself and change your status at the school forever! No doubt word will get around quick and who knows, this may make you king of this place! This was gonna be big!

With a heavy intake of breath and a steady exhale, you retracted your helmet, revealing your face. You didnt expect them to be able to recognize you so you kept the speakers on.

"Im Josh!", you said proudly.

"What the fuck? Josh?", Dylan said. "How did you get like that?"

"Well I uhh... I got this suit."

"Suit? From where?", Andrew asked.

"Well lets not get bogged down with the details guys come on."

Cassidy snickered. "Yeah cuz THATS not suspicious at all."

"No no its nothing like that. I sorta just found it."

You did your best to dodge their questions, deciding that the whole mystery of this would make this more appealing to everyone, but you suspected it was doing more to make you look like a simpleton than anything else.

"Okay guys look. What matters is Ive got a suit that lets me shrink at will! I mean, I could probably get as small as atoms if I wanted to. This thing could fly too but... well... Kenzie kind of busted it."

Kenzies eyes furrowed at the accusation.

"What? How did I break it? I didnt even know you were here!"

"No I know. You just accidentally hit me with your hair when you put it in a ponytail."

"Did I really? Are you okay?"

"Yeah Im fine, no worries."

"Jeez Kenz. You smacked him with your hair, you almost just crushed him. Josh you better stay away from her if you know whats good for ya! Hahaha!", teased Dylan.

Nobody laughed at Dylans jest, feeling more concerned about Kenzies feelings, after all, unintentional homicide wasnt usually a very funny topic.

After Dylan quit giggling he continued talking with a proposition for you.

"Dude! We got to show to everyone! Imagine how famous this will make us! This is world news right here!"

Damn... world news. That was alot of pressure you didnt think you were ready for. Not to mention that the Professor guy who left you this thing in the first place was obviously trying to hide it from someone well connected.

"Dylan relax. Maybe Josh isnt as hyper as you and just wants to relax after what just happened. Ive got a free period if you just want to take it easy with me.", Sophia suggested warmly.

Now that sounded good across the board! Your only reservation with that was Kenzie. You knew she had a big chemistry test coming on and from the way she talked about it with you before, she wasnt well prepared. Maybe you should offer to give her a little help?
1412323122.title: Tell the truth but bask in the attention

choices: Just help Kenzie with the test
14123231221.content:
"Well I appreciate the offer guys but um... sooo... Kenzie? I can help you out with your chemistry test if you want."

Kenzies faced quickly brightened up at your request.

"Are you serious!? Yes! Thank you thats awesome!"

Seeing Kenzie happy made you happy that she would gladly allow her shrunken friend to tag along with her. Ofcourse you offered because she is a close friend and you wanted to help, but the big bonus to this was you were going to be up close and personal on an hugely attractive girls body by her choice!

As the others bickered and complained that they didnt get their way, you took the few seconds of chaos to admire Kenzies body. Her tanned, tonned body was covered by a line green loose fitting tanktop, that allowed her black bra straps that ran over her shoulders to be in full view. She had three threaded bracelets on one wrist. One had her name designed into it and the others were simply unused hair elastics. You couldnt see her pants now because of the bench, but when you were up on the tree branch you could see she was wearing light grey capris joggers and brown birkenstocks. It was certainly an outfit that complimented her tomboyish personality. But she had the face and body that if she was wearing nothing but a trash bag she would still look gorgeous!

Your thoughts are interupted by the first bell ringing so loud that your head began to spin, causing to squat down into the fetal position and block your ears with your forearms. You quickly equipped your helmet back on to help deafen the sound which luckily worked like a charm.

Nobody appeared to notice your discomfort between their arguing and the bell, as they all began packing their books back into the bag. Including Kenzie, who politely asked you to hop off her book for a second so she could tuck it into her gym bag. You obliged, then said your goodbyes to the others (aside from Andrew who also had chemistry) as they grumpily walked off to their classes or wherever they needed to be.

You turned back towards Kenzie who at this point was standing up, making her appear even more gigantic than when she was sitting, so much more so that you had to crane your neck in order to see her face.

She stepped out from the benchs seat and hesitantly offer her hand down to you. You thought she must have reservations about a tiny boy being so close to her. Which confused you, as she was the usually the one who had great comfort with her own body,... remembering back to that one time someone was taking about belly buttons and Kenzie without hesitation lifted her shirt to show hers off to anybody who was looking. But... you couldnt exactly blame her for being so nervous. This was undoubtedly a first for both of you. However, with her being the Kenzie you knew, you could bet that she would warm up to it pretty fast.

Kenzie patiently waited for you to get on.

"Josh? You coming?"

"Oh... yeah sorry."

You stepped onto Kenzies finger and walked into the center of her palm. You couldnt help but feel as she raised you up to her shoulder, that the roles have been reversed quite pleasantly, with the hand that threatened to end you not even five minutes ago, was now giving you a comfortable ride.

You chuckle at the thought as you hop from Kenzies hand to her shoulder, and she begins to walk in the school. You sat down on her soft warm flesh next to her black bra strap, blending your dark suit clad body in next to it to avoid any sharp eyes of the other students from spotting you. Once you were settled, you, Kenzie and Andrew all headed off to homeroom chemistry.

So far, despite having a busted flight system, this whole experience was going well for you. Kenzies body heat, combined with the steady rocking from her walk and softness of her skin threatened to lull you to sleep. It was only thanks to your quiet conversation that you didnt embarass yourself by passing out right now.

The two of you conversed about different ways you could go about this. Ranging from pranking the teacher, copying off others, hiding in Kenzies pocket with her phone and googling the answers, while Andrew simply stared at your tiny form, still in minor disbelief this was really happening.

You looked back at Andrew.

"Uh... you alright there buddy?", you asked.

Kenzie looked down at you then to Andrew with a slight puzzled expression.

"Yeah Im fine its just... I mean... look at you man. Nobody thought something like this was possible but here you are. You should really count yourself lucky. I would punch a baby for a chance to see what life is like that small."

"Wow. You must really want this huh?"

"Ofcourse!"

Your body wanted something you could provide. The suit did have a ray that could shrink down anything it hits. Your only qualm was Andy wouldnt have this suit to protect him. If he was brought down to your height, you and Kenzie would be his only protection, otherwise hes helpless!

You think about it and...
14123231221.title: Kenzie wants you to help her cheat on the test

141232313.content:
Okay okay, your suit may be damaged right now, but that doesn't mean you can't have some little bit of fun while you think of a way to fix it. You like to have some experience on what's it like to be as small as a bug and mess around with people. You look around to find someone on the courtyard for you to play with. And what do you know, you managed to find three of them; these are the ones you have a grudge on or heavily dislike you.

First, there was the rich bitch herself, Hannah. She was with her friend, Marcia and they appear to be talking to each other. Just like many other rich bitches, she is cruel, controlling, and hostile towards others of lower social status. You didn't like her one bit especially ever since she openly insulted and humiliated your girlfriend, Alexis in the past. You wanted to go and teach her a lesson and you have the right equipment to do so.

Second, there's your homeroom teacher, Ms. Kelly walking across the yard. She really hates you alot because you often goof around in class and was very harsh to you. You tried to tell her that trying to ruin your student's life will not solve anything, but she didn't care. You also want to teach her lesson with your new size as well.

And finally, there's the school bully, Matthew. He was with two of his lackeys, Jeff and Sasha. The three are currently picking on some wimpy geek boy. He was one of your worst enemy in school and you try to get in trouble him for some time, but he always managed to pretended to be all innocent which causes you get all the blame for it. Thanks to this device, you can finally have the chance to give him a piece of your mind.

With three of your enemies, you have to choose one.

Who do you go after?
141232313.title: Let's Mess Around

choices: You climb up her body to start your plan from there
You start your plan from below
You are spotted by them before you could do anything
1412323131.content:
Looking at Hannah, you just couldn't ignore her any longer. You really wanted to teach her a lesson on picking on those below her, especially on Alex. You have the exact item for your vengeance on her so you don't want to lose your chance. After making your decision, you jumped off of McKenzie's textbook, then the table, and finally on the ground. You make your way towards the bench where both Hannah and Marcia are sitting.

After running and dodging several giants, you made it to the two giant girls. You stop right next to Hannah and look up to her from the ground.

She is known to wear lots of clothes that shows off her body and it's no wonder why so many people around your school really admire her alot. She wears a white midriff-baring top with pink stripes, blue denim shorts that is tied by a white belt with some jewels on it, and a pair of black knee-high boots. This outfit seems to cost a lot of money, just like almost all of her previous ones.

Now that you are here, it's time to began your fun/revenge.

What happens next?
1412323131.title: Taking The Bitch Down

choices: bring it somewhere to have it examined
1413.content: Though the excitement was extreme, you decided to sit down and think over what you could do more carefully...
1413.title: Take some time

choices: Shrink and grow things around you
14133.content:
You wanted to know more about this suit, especially if it had even more potential. But the letter warned you of the government so you couldn't trust anyone that could have any connection to them. Luckily for you your best friend Mitch is some sort of super genius who's already one of the smartest people in the US. You're lucky you met him in kindergarten or otherwise you wouldn't have met him at all since he finished his education way earlier than you.

You stuff the suit into a large bag and drive off to your Mitch's house down the road. The house itself is pretty normal but Mitch has an additional building behind it where he has everything he uses. You're sure he has all the equipment he needs to examine this suit, even if you understand pretty much none of what he's doing in there.
You park your car nearby and walk up to the front door. You knock on the door how you usually do it, 3 fast knocks followed by a long pause and one last knock. You started to use this to let Mitch's family know it's you because a lot of people started to come here after Mitch got a bit more well-known. The door swings open and Mitch's sister Courtney looks at you with a smile, "Good morning, Mitch is in his fortress of solitude like usual. I'm going out for a quick jog but Kari is in her room and my mom is in the bathroom if you need anything!". "Alright, seeya!" is all you get to say before she walks past you and begins her morning jog. You walk straight through the house into the backyard and towards Mitch's "fortress of solitude". You wave into the camera at the door and it makes a sound signaling that you can open it. After walking up some stairs you reach Mitch's main room of the building.

"Normally you don't come here so early if you don't have anything exciting to tell me or need my help, which one is it today?"
"Well Mitch, you're in luck because today it's both! Take a look at this!" With that you open your bag, pull out the suit and hand it to Mitch.
"A weird suit? I hope you don't want me to go to some costume party with you again."
"Nope, this is science related this time. This might sound weird but someone dropped this off at my place to hide it from the government and it has the ability to shrink and grow back whoever wears it."
"And you want me to believe that?"
"Kinda, but you owe me a huge favor anyway from last week when I got you a six pack of pepsi at 3am."
"Alright, this should be entertaining either way. So what do you want me to do with this then?"
"Well, I thought you could check it out, do some tests and maybe find some unused potential. You're the smart guy here, you'll figure something out."

After that you waited around while Mitch was walking around the buildings and doing a lot of stuff you couldn't understand if you tried. 15 minutes passed until Mitch came back with the suit, but it looked a bit different now. "So, it seems that you were actually telling me the truth. The suit was already a groundbreaking piece of technology when you arrived, but I think I was able to improve it. You can now...
14133.title: Bring it somewhere to have it examined

After opening your closet and about to hit the intruder with a bat, you suddenly saw something that quickly zipped right past you. You first thought it was a fly or some other flying insect, but you saw a small glowing blue orb and realized that no other insect can provide a light that bright; not even a firefly. The light landed on your desk and you (with a bat still in hand) slowly approach the mysterious creature.

You take a close look at what this thing might be once you got there. Unfortunately, it was too bright to make out what it really was but much to your surprise, you could have sworn that it looked humanoid in appearance; you never seen a bug like this before.

Just as you were about to grab it, the strange creature immediately flew away from your desk and right past you; it looks like you must of scared it.

What happens next?
143.title: A Fairly Rare Find

choices: Yes they did and you got smaller than them
No they didn't and you captured them
They kind of succeed as they shrunken someone else in your house instead
1432.content:
The mysterious creature flew around your room for a bit before flying right through your window. At first you wanted to go and catch it to see what it is, but you decided that it wasn't worth it. Who knows, maybe you were just seeing things or maybe it really is a firefly that was so bright, you mistook it for a small human. Either way, you sat down on your bed thinking on what to do next.

While you think, you were unaware of an ongoing plan by a group containing that glowing creature along with five other similar creatures outside your house; amongist the grass of your front yard.

-----------------------------------------

After a hasty retreat from that human boy, Lucy makes her way to the others. Once she got there, they were all expecting to see if she managed to succeed in shrinking him down. "Sorry girls, but this Josh boy have heard me and nearly try to kill me with a freakin baseball bat." She announced on the report.

"Wow, this boy really is dangerous." cried Mandy, the most shy and sensitive of the group "I'm so glad you're okay."

"That boy is gonna pay for trying to squish us like bugs." yelled Andrea, the tomboyish and athletic type (Little did they know that you were just doing several stuff for your personal pleasure and were unaware of them being in your way. As a result, you often nearly harm them while doing activities).

"You said it Andrea, we'll show him once we shrunk him down to the size of a puny speck and see who's the tough guy now." said Vivian, the beauty queen "If only of course, you did just that."

"You still have that bag of shrinking dust, right?" asked Irma, the energetic and upbeat fairy girl. "Yes I do." Lucy showed the others the bag which still carries the dust "I was just about to shrink him while he sleeps, but I got hit by one of his junks and fell down."

"Hmmm...I'm starting to think of a plan myself. It's brilliant, but it's also quite risky" said Tiffany, the genius of the six. Everyone looked at her and listened to her idea. "If all six of us outnumber Josh and began flying around his room, he'll get so distracted by a bunch of glowing lights that he wouldn't notice the one with the bag and get shrunk. Are you girls interested in this plan?"

The fairies thought for about a few minutes. It was indeed a risky plan, but what choice do they even have. "Alright girls, let's go with Tiffany's idea." Lucy said as they all make their way to the window of their unaware nemesis. Everyone can't wait to shrink Josh into a very tiny size that they'll soon tower over him like giants themselves.

Do they succeed in shrinking you?
1432.title: The Vengeful Fairies

14321.content:
You were sitting in your bed and couldn't get that thought out of head while you still think. Just what was that ball of light you saw earlier? You wanted to do something, but you can't stop thinking about it. You stood up to your bed and decided to go outside to clear your head but before you do, you suddenly saw something zipped past you and right in front of your face. You don't believe it, the glowing ball of light is back. However, this was yellow in color instead of blue. "I think I need a close on what the hell this thing even is." You thought to youself and plan to catch it.

You reached out to grab it, but it dodges your hand and flew away from you. This time however, you didn't ignore it and went after it. Suddenly, you saw yet another ball of light that was on your desk and it was green in color. It immediately flew past you and just as you going to chase it, you saw ANOTHER similar creature in red color standing on your bed; it also flew away once you approached it. Suddenly, you felt something poking the back of your head and saw of course, another one of these ball of lights and it was orange in color. It sways back and forth as if was taunting you to grab it in which you tried, but it dodges your hand. While trying to grab it, a purple ball of light quickly landed on your nose and you atempt to grab it, but ended up hitting your face. You look around your room, seeing a bunch of colorful lights flying all over you. "Where are these things coming from?!" You thought to yourself. You were so focused on them that you didn't the same blue orb of light behind you and you suddenly got hit by dust. After coughing a few bit, you began to feel weak as your world slowly went black.

It didn't took long enough for you to wake up and get your senses back but you immediately can tell that something wasn't right. For starters, your room looked bigger for some reason but not big as in length, it was big as in size. Every stuff in your room were gigantic, hell it would take hours to get all the way to the walls. "What the hell is this?!" You yelled "I'm about a few centimeters tall!" How could this happen? Were those glowing balls response for this? Speaking of which, you hear some giggles from high above and after that, a series of loud twinkling sounds are heard. They were slowly getting louder and louder almost as if they were coming towards you.

BOOM!

BOOM!

BOOM!

BOOM!

BOOM!

BOOM!

Just like that, your surroundings were immediately darken by shadows and all around you were six towering giants. These giants were all humanoid in appearance and all female. Not to mention, they were also all very attractive and beautiful women that all look to be in their 20s. How do these gorgeous girls get in your room in the first place? All you could remember was trying to catch those ball of...wait a minute. You take a good look on all of them and realized that they all have multiple color of skins and wings on their back.

Fairies? GIANT Fairies? This doesn't look so good...

The six of the fairies were all wearing same type of clothes you usually see on humans which was surprising as they might have come from a fairy society that was similar to humans.

The first one had blue skin and red short hair. She was wearing a black jacket over her lavender jumper dress and a pair of white socks and black shoes; she appears be holding a bag of some kind.

The second one has yellow skin and long orange hair. She was wearing a tight red T-shirt, a very long brown skirt that covered her legs, and a pair of blue sandals; she appears to be less menacing than the others.

The third one has green skin and blue hair that was tied up by a ponytail. She wears a short red hoodie that exposes her midriff with grey accents, a matching shorts that also has grey accents, a pair of orange knee-high socks and blue NIKE-like sneakers; she looks alot like an athletic of some sort.

The fourth one has red skin and jet black hair. Her attire contains a green tube top that exposes her midriff, a blue mini-skirt, and a pair of golden high-heeled sandals; she absolutely that most beautiful of the six.

The fifth one has orange skin and sky-blue bobcut-style hair. She was wearing a gray tank top, an incredibly short jean shorts that exposes almost all of her legs and a pair of black rubber boots; she looks at you with a smile that was bigger than the rest.

The sixth and final one has purple skin and short pink hair that was tied up by a headband. She wears glasses, a blue-yellow sweater over her white blouse with a green tie, a short red-orange skirt, a pair of green Scottish-style socks and blue maryjanes; she looks highly intelligent.

The giant fairies all look down at you which was making you scared, how did they even make you this small. "Well well well, you don't look so tough anymore." said the blue fairy with a grin. "And not to mention SOOO cute." the orange one chuckled.

What do they do to you?

143212.content:
The fairies all look down at you for a while and just as you where about to ask them why they shrink you, the blue one finally spook to you. "You know, you have been trying to kill us in the past for quite some time." she said with her arms folded.

"What do you mean?" you asked.

"Don't play dumb with us; you know what we meant." said the blue fairy. "You been trying to step on us like a bunch of ants!"

"I never even seen you girls before; I didn't meant to try and squish you." you yelled "Besides you were all too small to be seen so how I'm I supposed to know?"

"And now you are the small one around here." said the green one. "So now it's time to see how it feels to be stomped." She then lifts her sneaker and attempts to squish you before the blue one stopped her. "Hold it right there, I think I got something that will teach him a lesson that he won't forget." She looks back at you and said "We thought of trying to crush you back, but I think what better way to just leave you here and only to get stepped on by your own friends and family; I bet they will never notice a little speck-sized boy like yourself. In other words, it's the ultimate payback." You don't believe it; these fairies have shrunken you and plan to abandon you here so that you get squished by someone. "Wait wait wait, can we talk about this please?" you begged "I'm pretty sure we'll work things out, right?" The blue fairy shook her head "I'm afraid it's too late for apologies human boy. Now if you excuse us, we have some other things to do." The six fairies slowly lift themselves off the floor. "Enjoy your life as a little speck!" called out the red one.

The fairies fly up to the air and make their way to the open window.

What happens next?

151.content:
You were completely consumed by fear. Atleast your shirt shelter gave you some small measure of comfort, though it really shouldn't because you couldnt see if anything was approaching. But just because you couldnt see doesnt mean you cant hear.

Footsteps! Loud thunderous footsteps! Your survival instinct peaked out from under your cowardice. You at least had to peak out from under your shirt to make sure those feet wouldnt crush you. Luckily, you seemed to have shrunken close to the neck of your shirt, so it wasnt long before you were able to walk to the edge and see what the cause of all that commotion was...
