1511.content:
You see a group of four giants coming into your way, an all-female group to be exact. The giantesses are nothing more than a bunch of young women, no older than 20. You don't want to bother describing what they look like and quickly hide inside your shirt. You wanted to get some help from these girls, but you don't want to expose your nude body to their faces, that will be too embarrassing. You stay inside your clothes and hope that they pay no attention to the pile of clothes in the middle of nowhere.

The footsteps were getting louder and the quakes were getting stronger; they were coming in close. You decided to take a swift look at them to see if they notice something. You peek out from your discarded shirt and observed the giant girls from it.
1511.title: Four Giants

15113.content:
These giants were standing all around you. You could hear them talking among themselves high above you, sounding like gods in the heavens to your puny ears. They were wondering why they had just came across a pile of abandoned clothing.. rightfully so, as your cat DJ t-shirt and pair of polka dot boxers definetly wasnt something that was commonly left on the sidewalks around your neighbourhood.

Now was not the time to be thinking about these girls thoughts though.

"Whoa... um... guys? I think theres a streaker running around here.", said one of the girls.

"Oh my god thats disgusting. I swear if he pops out at us im pepper spraying him."

"Wait a minute... isnt that Joshs shirt?"

"Oh yeah. That stupid DJ cat. Josh is streaking around his own neighbours?... thats pretty wild."

You were left puzzled. These girls knew you. Obviously you must go to school with them so they must be younger than 20 like you originally thought. Thinking more on it... you always knew you recognized those voices from somewhere. Your pindering is cut off however, as the walls of the shirt starts to crinkle in as if someone just grabbed it. The shirt began to rise and you got lifted up with the fabric as it rose higher and higher into the air. With the shirt draped all around you, you could see nothing past it until suddenly it was spread open, leaving you to find yourself hanging onto the cats pupil on your shirt, and revealing the faces of four girls you knew from school who were now the size of skyscrapers staring back at you!

Ofcourse it wasnt you they were looking at, it was the cat.

Of these four gigantas, you recognized them as Miriam, Julie, Sydney and Taylor.

Miriam was the one who was holding you and your shirt. An 18 year old girl with caramel skin, shoulder length black hair and brown eyes. Shes wearing a dark blue denim jean jacket, black v-neck undershirt, black spandex pants and brown ankle sandals. A part of you (though terrified) was relieved to see her. She was one of your oldest, closest and... compliacted friends. The two of you had dated before long ago. And though Miriam had moved past it due to her easy going nature, you had a tendency to linger on your feelings, still not being able to shake all your attractions for her. Though you managed to hide them from Alissa. Miriam was what the guys liked to call... thicc. Nice, curvy ass. Thick thighs, and well developed breasts, she was a stunner to be sure.

Then there was Julie. Great to the people she chose to be friends with, an absolute bitch to most everyone else, even friends of friends if she didnt deem them worthy. She was like she got plucked straight out of a high school movie. Captain of the cheerleaders, long blond hair, blue eyes, great rack, great ass. Even her outfit fit her personality trait.. of being an absolute slut. Tiny blue tanktop with wave patterns that did little to hide the outline of her nipples. An exposed midriff that showed off her toned abs and bellybutton piercing. Short jean shorts with a brown leather belt and black converse shoes. Okay, so maybe its not that whore-ish... you just really didnt get along with her.

Sydney! She was pretty cool. Very athletic so she had an ass to rival that of Julies and an even more perfect rack. However, due to Sydney being alot more reserved than Julie, Sydney didnt get near as "popular" with the guys. Her long brown hair was done back into a ponytail, which rested on the back of her red form fitting t-shirt. She also wore faded, lightly distressed jeans and all white converse shoes.

And finally Taylor. Someone with a massive social media following due to her stunning good looks. Taylor spent most of her time studying in the sun so not only did she have a gorgeous tan to match her gorgeous body, but she was also very intelligent. She too had long brown hair, and again, like the rest, great ass, great rack. However, unlike the reserved Sydney, Taylor had little issue with showing her skinny body off. She was wearing a yellow sundress and gladiator sandals that rose up to just below her knee.

You sure felt pretty lucky that these girls found you... now they just have to actually FIND you!
15113.title: Quartet of Gigantas

151131.content:
At this size, you’re way to small to be recognized as a person.. you had to be heard and now was your chance. You run and jump over wrinkles as the four girls continue to ponder and come up with scenarios as to what happened

“Maybe he got vaporized by aliens, haha!” Sydney joked. At this point, maybe being vaporized by aliens wouldn’t have been so bad..

Miriam’s thumb was close, if you could get there and hold onto her bracelet at her wrist, you’d have a chance to climb to her shoulder.

“Oh well, if he wants it so bad, he will come back and get it” Miriam shrugged and letting go of the shirt.

It was now or never. You jumped right as Miriam released your shirt.. however you overshot her thumb and tumbled down her hand, UNDER her bracelet and down into her sleeve while you slid down her arm, getting slapped by the tiny hairs that covered her arm..

You finally came to a halt at the crack of her bicep and forearm. Quickly grabbing a hair as she extended her arm back down to her side.. You had no other choice than to climb up Miriam's bicep to her shoulder, or back towards her hand which was now facing the ground.
151131.title: Leap onto Miriam

choices: Miriam feels a drop on her hand
You attempt to make it to her shoulder
You cant hold on any longer
1511312.content:
"Dont you think we should drop them off at his house atleast?", Taylor suggested.

"What? No way I'm starving! Lets just go get lunch.", said Julie.

"Alright, I guess we should bring them back. Its not far out of the way Julie. His house is just back there.", Miriam said, pointing at your house a few properties behind them.

She was unaware that her raised arm currently housed the tiny owner of those clothes deep in her sleeve. You were surprised and motion sick to feel Miriams arm level out to the point that you could stand on it.

For whatever reason, (maybe because you didnt understand the context behind the arm movement because you werent listening to the conversation Miriam was having), you released your grip on the small arm hair and took this as a instance of good luck.

"Wow!", you said to yourself."I dont even have to climb! I can just walk up to her shouldeeeeWAAAAAA!!!"

Your victory monologue was cut short as Miriam dropped her arm back down to her side, causing you to slam against the rough denim of the sleeve and bounce back onto her skin, only to now find yourself sliding uncontrollably down her arm towards her hand!

Meanwhile, the girls had decided to do you a kindness by bringing your clothes back home. Taylor and Sydnee had taken up the task of carrying the clothes this time, and they all began walking down the street to your home, just as you had reached Miriams bracelet!

Your feet touched down violently on the wrist accessory, causing your knees to buckle enough that you couldnt stop yourself from dropping off the bracelet, only saved by a reflexive outreach by your hand that managed to grab onto Miriam's bracelet! And now here you were, dangling off your friends wrist like the poor helpless insect you had become.

To make matters even worse, the constant slow swaying of her arm was causing that motion sickness to build up again. It didnt take long for your guts to expel your lunch out through your mouth, splashing onto Miriams skin, and dripping all the way down about 100 feet (to your size) to her fingers.

"Oh god, can this day get any more demeaning?", you groaned.
1511312.title: Returning lost items

15113121.content:
The good news is that your upchuck has gotten Miriam's attention which was enough for her to take a look at this wet thing on her hand. She stops right at tracks which have confused the other girls.

"Something wrong, Miriam." asked Syndey.

"I just felt something on my hand." said Miriam and lifts her hand to her face.

This is it, you finally got a chance to get your friend's attention and hopefully try to help your little problem out. However, you see a disgusted expression on her face, and this is where the bad news comes into view.

"Ewwww, a bird just poop on my hand!" She yelled in disgust. It seems that Miriam thought your mess of vomit was actually bird droppings and your hopes shatters yet again.

"Oh my god really? Gross!" said Julie while sticking her tongue.

"Here Miriam, use this to clean up the poop." said Syndey as she hands her a small towel.

"Thanks Syndey, now time to clean up this stupid bird's crap." said Miriam and bring the towel down to her hand.

You screamed as the giant threads descend down like a UFO landing. You need to get your ass out of here NOW! Unfortunately, you don't have any time to get inside her sleeve for protection. So your only hope was to leap off of her hand and onto her torso which was closer. You better hurry too because it's getting closer.

What happens next?
15113121.title: Miriam Cleaning Up Your Mess

151131212.content:
Sadly, your attempts to jump off was cut short because the falling towel was too fast for you to dodge. With that, you found yourself getting up close with the fine threads that were ready to wipe off your gunk.

The towel lands about a few feet from you and Miriam starts to drag it across her arm. You just stood there as it was pretty oblivious that you were unable to get away from it in time so all you have to do was to accept your fate.

The towel smacks towards you with a swift speed but instead of getting smeared by it, you fling off from it and her arm, sailing across the air at high speeds.

You scream at the top of your lungs as you thought that you were going to fall onto the ground and kill yourself. However, little did you know that you were going straight for one of Miriam's friends and will land towards them.

Whose body did you end up on?

At first, this very moment will be your last and you are going to wake up in heaven right after you land for the concrete ground. But instead of instant death, you found yourself landing on something soft and made out of fabric. You open your eyes and realized that you found yourself on a black shoe; you have a feeling whose shoe this belongs to. You nervously look up and behind those gigantic set of boobs, you could make out the face of none other than your worst enemy, Julie. After discovering this, you now wish for instant death. Off all of Miriam's friends you could've ended up, it just have to be the bitchy one herself. You can't even imagine what will happen if she even spot you and you try hard not to imagine the possibilities of what she's going to do with you.

"Okay, let's go take Josh's clothes back to his house." Taylor said.

"Ugh let's hurry already!" yelled Julie whose voice is enough to cover your ears very quickly.

The shoe you are on now begans to lift off from the ground and slam onto it while your ride is walking; you hold on to avoid falling off. You look at Miriam's sandals on the right and wanted to leap for them so that you could get back to getting her attention. Of course, that's too dangerous as you'll might miss your mark and will end up losing the others as a result. Your other plan was to wait here until they get to your house, but you are not sure how long are you going to hold. This last plan is MUCH more risker as it involving climbing up Julie's body and either go for Miriam or seek shelter on Julie for a while.

What happens next?
1511312121.title: Smacked Into The Dangerzone

1512.content:
Peeking out from under your now-huge shirt, you were able to see a towering jogger girl running in your direction. You couldn't make out her facial features from your current distance and position, but you did notice that her brown hair was in a ponytail, and she was wearing a blue tank top and grey yoga sweatpants.

The jogger looked somewhat familiar to you, although you couldn't remember WHERE you first saw her. Your pondering came to a swift end when she neared your location and...
1512.title: Jogging Your Memory

choices: You hide out there while she takes the dog to a park.
She eventually gets to her house, where you're able to escape.
You're thrown out as she walks, landing somewhere random.
1513.content:
You peeked out of your shirt and your blood instantly ran cold. You were frozen pure terror. Gusts of humid wind nearly blew your tiny, petrified form back into the depths of your shirt. Buffeted by muggy breath, you let out a whimper as you found yourself face-to-snout with a behemoth German shepherd.

The enormous beast leaned in closer, maybe an inch away from you. You couldn't get your legs to move as it sniffed at your clothes with a wet, black nose the size of a two car garage. Its mouth hung open enough for a mammoth tongue to bob out. A tongue more than large enough to lap you up. You were sure you were about to be drawn into the dog’s cavernous maw when you heard a booming voice from even farther above.

“What’d you find, Clover?”

Impossibly huge, black Nike slides thundered into view. To your relief, “Clover” moved aside as her owner crouched to inspect the seemingly abandoned pile of clothes. Skyscraper legs the color of honey were exposed by her athletic shorts. You caught a glimpse of her white crop-top right before the ground was ripped from under you.

“No, wait! Stop!” You shouted in a panic as the giant lifted your shirt. Everything went sideways and you rolled out of the neck. You smacked painfully onto the sidewalk, landing right next to her foot. She’d stood back up to her full, daunting height. The girl, who you guessed by her skin tone was Latina, chuckled.

“A cat DJ shirt?” You couldn't see past her chest but you could almost hear the smirk on her face. You were about to run back to your pants pocket when a massive shadow appeared overhead. A bucket’s worth of drool fell from the sky, splattering right between your feet. You looked up. Standing between you and your clothes was Clover. The monstrous dog was staring right at you, her head tilted slightly in confusion.

You immediately bolted in the opposite direction. You could hear the gigantic German shepherd sniffing after you. Desperate not to be licked up like a bit of kibble, you looked for any place to hide.

Realizing the dog’s owner was standing still, you dashed toward the open front of her sandal. You had to jump to clamber onto its thin sole. Hesitating for a moment, you grimaced at the sight of her massive toes. The fleshy hills shifted as she absentmindedly wiggled them. Even the smallest one was the size of a shed. A deafening bark rang out nearby and you knew you had to bite the bullet. You didn't even risk looking back, pushing into the space between the two largest digits.

While it was safer there, you couldn't help but be a little grossed out. You wrinkled your nose at the faint, cheesy smell overpowering her lotion. The warm little nook you were in was noticeably sweaty. Your tiny form was squished by walls of thick skin.

How the hell did you end up small enough to fit between some random girl's toes?
1513.title: Walking the Dog

choices: The woman plays catch with her dog
The woman sits down while the dog runs around
The woman starts a conversation with another dog walker
15131.content:
You gasp a few deep breaths to calm yourself as you linger in the shadow of these two toes. What is the woman doing above you? Having found your deserted clothes, is she going to change her dogwalking plans, maybe call the authorities?

Seems like no. Your shirt drifts down in front of you, casually discarded by this giantess as if it weren't big enough to cover a small town. "Come on, Clover!" she thunders so far above you, and then she continues walking her dog.

Walking means taking steps, and as her sandalled foot launches off you are privileged to witness the toes press down, paling at the undersides with the immense power channelling through them. There is a grinding noise that only you can hear as those monoliths of powerful skin crush down, and then the whole platform beneath your feet launches into the air.

It tilts to an extreme angle, and your breathing transforms to screaming as you scramble to keep hold. Then you needn't bother as sudden acceleration presses you into the gross black surface. You are pulled screaming along with the rest of the footwear by the undeniable strength of the goddess, then roll slightly as the wall once more becomes floor and you are plunging downwards once more.

As you plunge, the toes to either side of you rise, exposing their hardened undersides, impossibly tough and just a small part of an ever so much greater whole.

The foot makes landfall with explosive impact, moments later the toes crashing down either side of you. You bounces and slam against both sides like a pinball, battered by the rough skin of this woman. Bruised, you gasp again, only for the cycle to begin anew with no delay.

The flurry of steps that she takes is brutal, no respite for the insect between her toes. Any breakfast you may have had in you deserted your stomach long ago, belched into the void along with any courage you may have had. This was a stupid idea! You're going to die, and no one will ever notice! Why did you ever -

The sudden silence cuts into your very thoughts. Everything is still, the toes settled in place, their imposing power barely restrained to either side of you. Blinking, you gaze into what little light penetrates your enclosure, and see the dog dashing off across an endless city of green tower blocks, stomping down patches with careless abandon.

Right, you might have a moment to collect your thoughts while the dog's owner lets it run free off the leash. But how to get aid from her? You'll have to get out from between her toes, and maybe see to climbing up that...

You crane your neck back, taking in the stretch of flesh of her legs, shifting ever so slightly as she stands restlessly. That'll be... quite a climb, even is she does remain totally motionless! Let's hope that she does just that, eh?

The toes have plentiful handholds with the skin cells linked so crudely, and there's no time like the present.
15131.title: Between the Toes of Giants

choices: A dog walker is in the way
152.content:
From the looks of your empty jeans, you were about the size of the zipper tab on the crotch!

"Shit. At this point I'm closer to Alex's house than mine... but damn... a two minute walk at this size is gonna take an hour!"


Your only solace at the thought of such a journey was it was early enough on the morning that for the most part, the sidewalks wouldn't be bustling with people. But that didnt mean the bugs werent out looking for food. At this early in the morning, and with the forecast being so hot and humid, the insects out here are going to on a feeding frenzy!

It was clear to you that going on your own without protection was pretty much a death sentence. You needed to craft up some weapons.

As far as choices for materials, there was limited to go off of. All that was available was the aluminum of your pants zipper or whatever you could scrounge up off the ground. First things first, you walk over to your shirt and make yourself a long shirt with a piece you ripped off.

Then you went to your zipper and began the grueling task of working the tab out from the fabric one thread at a time until it finally came off. The tab was surpisingly not very heavy to you. It felt just the right weight for a shield. You then walked over to a crack in the sidewalk and pulled out a sliver of shattered concrete.

"There we go. You're a regular spartan now Josh.", you say dryly.

With yet another piece of torn fabric, you fashin a back strap for the shield, then set off on your quest to your girlfriends house.
152.title: Onwards to Alex's

info.brief_description: A  plethora of stories featuring a 17 year old boy named Josh and his shrunken adventures
info.description:
I have deleted this story twice. Once over stupid frustration and the second time over trying to revive the story only to fail. This time no matter how i feel about this story its going to stay up for you; the readers. I apologize to anyone who enjoyed them and especially to everyone who contributed to it.

Your character is Josh, a 17 year old boy and depending on what option you choose, your character can range from a dumb ass to a boy genius.

The point of view can be changed, but only in ways that make sense in whatever narrative it occurs in.

Josh: A 17 year old blonde haired, blue eyed white boy.

Chris: Josh's older brother. Has started up his own Marketing business and is also a bit of a meathead. His girlfriends name is Danielle.

Danielle:
https://m.imgur.com/gallery/yzYfCiu

Jennifer: Josh's mother. A 36 year old real estate agent. Loves and cares for her children deeply. Is divorced with your father but they harbour no resentment towards each other and has a nearly paternal relationship with your step sisters.
http://www.justjared.com/photo-gallery/1362091/jennifer-aniston-rare-jewel-03/

Rick: Josh's father. A 48 year old dark haired man. Works in architectural design and construction.
https://images.onepixel.com/3919ae16-f23e-a878-3857-e41de72284fe_1000.jpg?auto=f...

Kate: Josh' step mother. A 42 year brunette woman. Is a lawyer in a prestigious firm. Has a shaky relationship with you only, but she loves her children. Is competitive with your mother.
https://goo.gl/images/UWYxPT

Lauren: Kate's younger half-sister from a french father. A 30 year old music artist, and model with a large following of fans, including yourself. Lauren is competitive with Kate and likes to show you affection just to annoy your step mother. She is a very collected woman who never loses her cool.
https://imgur.com/a/G4ZHu6M

Jessica: Josh's older step sister. 27 years old. Loves the outdoors, going on adventures and seeing the world. Has a black belt in martial arts and a fiance. Loves her entire family including your mother.
JD https://imgur.com/a/KK4o6I9

Anna: Josh's 15 year old younger step sister. Typical teenage girl. Has mood swings, mostly hostile towards everyone, and never around the house for long, unless secluded in her room.

Mitch: Josh's best friend. Blonde haired and all around awesome guy. Loyal friend. Has two older sisters named Courtney (21) and Kari (26).

Alexis: Josh's girlfriend of two years. 5' 6", Long dirty blond hair, brown eyes. 18 years old, only older than you by a few months. Very kind and compassionate, but god help you if you get on her bad side.

Diana: Your girlfriends older sister. 5' 8" ,Chest length golden blonde hair, brown eyes. 20 years old and extremely popular.


Additional Characters:

Megan: 5' 5", shoulder length brown hair, brown eyes. Jessica's best friend since highschool. 26 years old. Megan is a professional dancer and choreographer. She and Josh have a good relationship, with her often teasing him by telling him how cute he is just to make him blush. Which Josh doesnt mind, considering Megan is one of the hottest women he knows! His crush on her has been ongoing for 7 years.

Trish: 5' 9", breast length golden blonde hair, blue eyes. Jessica's and Megan's friend. They met in a party when Megan did a body shot out of Trish's belly button. More valley girlish in personality.

Mari: 5' 3", dyed faded blue hair. Green eyes. Tanned skin. A very close friend of Josh's. An immigrant who moved from Japan and grew close to Josh in gym class freshman year. She speaks Japanese and is fluent in english. Mari's style can be very extravagant yet simple. With her love of pop culture and her heritage, she can usually be seen wearing a piece of clothing with references to her culture or a tv show she adores.

Jordyn: 6' 0". Long curly brown hair, brown eyes. You have know Jordyn since kindergarden and aside from Mitch she is your closest friend. You are close with her family due to how often you hang out. She is a stylish girl. Wearing all sorts of attire such as sun dresses, jean jackets, tank tops, always creating fashionable outfits.

Krista: 5' 2", long dark brown hair, green eyes. Krista has a reputation for being impossible to dislike among her peers. She is shy, sweet, and very attractive. Aside from her close friends, Krista has more or less the same relationship with you as everyone else, a good one.

McKenzie: 5' 7", long straight brown hair, blue eyes. Affectionately called "Kenzie" for short, she has also known Josh since freshman year. Though she isnt as close to you as Mari and Jordyn, you are still very good friends to one another, often meeting at the same social events and sitting together at lunch. Much like Mari, Kenzie has also adopted a more tomboyish personality. Often wearing simplistic outfits such as tanktops, hoodies, jeans, sweatpants and sandals as opposed to skirts, heels, or more designer apparel. With her years as a gymnast, Kenzie's body is fit and toned like an athlete.

Sophia: 5' 6". Slightly past shoulder length summer blonde hair, brown eyes. Sophia is a very nice, very soft spoken girl with a talent for horse riding and a love for the animal. You and her dont talk much, not due to any negative feelings, but more due to general disinterest in the other. However, the thing you were definetly interested in was her beauty. But even during your days as a single man, her looks made her very intimidating for you to approach her.

Marcia: 5' 5", long charcoal, curly hair, blue eyes. A girl with a Afro-Hispanic mother and Causasian father, leaving her with soft caramel skin. She is among one of the great beauties of the whole school and is best friends with Hannah. Though she is more reserved in comparison to Hannahs harshness.

Hannah: 5' 6", long straight, light brown hair, green eyes. Hannah is the queen bee of your school. Manipulative, cunning, very intelligent and very beautiful. She comes from a wealthy family and shows it, wearing expensive clothing all the time and showing up to school in her convertible Jaguar on the daily. She hardly knows Josh exists.


Feel free to add new characters... just ensure that their arrivals make sense. Rules are virtually non existent, aside from the obvious...
-No trolling (ex. then he got big and the end hahaha)
-Leave options open unless ending a chapter that seems appropriate to end
Aside from those two, just feel free to read, relax and contribute if you feel like it. :D

Thank you to everyone that contributed so far!
